SOS due to its central location between the polish -- lithuanian commonwealth 's capitals of krakw and vilnius , warsaw became the capital of the commonwealth and of the crown of the kingdom of poland when king sigismund iii vasa moved his court from krakw to warsaw in 1596 . EOS
SOS due to its central location between the polish -- lithuanian commonwealth 's capitals of krakw and vilnius , warsaw became the capital of the commonwealth and of the crown of the kingdom of poland when king sigismund iii vasa moved his court from krakw to warsaw in 1596 . EOS
SOS warsaw gained the title of the " phoenix city " because it has survived many wars , conflicts and invasions throughout its long history . EOS
SOS the city is the seat of a roman catholic archdiocese -lrb- left bank of the vistula -rrb- and diocese -lrb- right bank -rrb- , and possesses various universities , most notably the polish academy of sciences and the university of warsaw , two opera houses , theatres , museums , libraries and monuments . EOS
SOS the city is the seat of a roman catholic archdiocese -lrb- left bank of the vistula -rrb- and diocese -lrb- right bank -rrb- , and possesses various universities , most notably the polish academy of sciences and the university of warsaw , two opera houses , theatres , museums , libraries and monuments . EOS
SOS the historic UNK of warsaw with its UNK old town in 1980 was listed as a unesco world heritage site . EOS
SOS other main architectural attractions include the castle square with the royal castle and the iconic king sigismund 's column , st. john 's cathedral , market square , palaces , churches and mansions all displaying a richness of colour and architectural detail . EOS
SOS warsaw provides many examples of architecture from the gothic , renaissance , baroque and neoclassical periods , and around a quarter of the city is filled with luxurious parks and royal gardens . EOS
SOS warsaw 's name in the polish language is warszawa , approximately / UNK / -lrb- also formerly spelled warszewa and warszowa -rrb- , meaning " belonging to warsz " , warsz being a shortened form of the masculine name of slavic origin warcisaw ; see also etymology of wrocaw . EOS
SOS warsaw 's name in the polish language is warszawa , approximately / UNK / -lrb- also formerly spelled warszewa and warszowa -rrb- , meaning " belonging to warsz " , warsz being a shortened form of the masculine name of slavic origin warcisaw ; see also etymology of wrocaw . EOS
SOS in actuality , warsz was a UNK nobleman who owned a village located at the modern-day site of mariensztat neighbourhood . EOS
SOS in actuality , warsz was a UNK nobleman who owned a village located at the modern-day site of mariensztat neighbourhood . EOS
SOS the official city name in full is UNK UNK warszawa -lrb- english : " the capital city of warsaw " -rrb- . EOS
SOS after UNK was raided by nearby clans and dukes , a new similar settlement was established on the site of a small fishing village called warszowa . EOS
SOS the prince of UNK , bolesaw ii of masovia , established this settlement , the modern-day warsaw , in about 1300 . EOS
SOS the prince of UNK , bolesaw ii of masovia , established this settlement , the modern-day warsaw , in about 1300 . EOS
SOS in the beginning of the 14th century it became one of the seats of the dukes of masovia , becoming the official capital of masovian duchy in 1413 . EOS
SOS upon the extinction of the local ducal line , the duchy was reincorporated into the polish crown in 1526 . EOS
SOS in 1529 , warsaw for the first time became the seat of the general sejm , permanent from 1569 . EOS
SOS in 1529 , warsaw for the first time became the seat of the general sejm , permanent from 1569 . EOS
SOS in 1573 the city gave its name to the warsaw confederation , formally establishing religious freedom in the polish -- lithuanian commonwealth . EOS
SOS due to its central location between the commonwealth 's capitals of krakw and vilnius , warsaw became the capital of the commonwealth and the crown of the kingdom of poland when king sigismund iii vasa moved his court from krakw to warsaw in 1596 . EOS
SOS due to its central location between the commonwealth 's capitals of krakw and vilnius , warsaw became the capital of the commonwealth and the crown of the kingdom of poland when king sigismund iii vasa moved his court from krakw to warsaw in 1596 . EOS
SOS warsaw remained the capital of the polish -- lithuanian commonwealth until 1796 , when it was annexed by the kingdom of prussia to become the capital of the province of south prussia . EOS
SOS warsaw remained the capital of the polish -- lithuanian commonwealth until 1796 , when it was annexed by the kingdom of prussia to become the capital of the province of south prussia . EOS
SOS liberated by napoleon 's army in 1806 , warsaw was made the capital of the newly created duchy of warsaw . EOS
SOS following the congress of vienna of 1815 , warsaw became the centre of the congress poland , a constitutional monarchy under a personal union with imperial russia . EOS
SOS the royal university of warsaw was established in 1816 . EOS
SOS warsaw was occupied by germany from 4 august 1915 until november 1918 . EOS
SOS the allied armistice terms required in article 12 that germany withdraw from areas controlled by russia in 1914 , which included warsaw . EOS
SOS germany did so , and underground leader UNK returned to warsaw on 11 november and set up what became the second polish republic , with warsaw the capital . EOS
SOS in the course of the UNK war of 1920 , the huge battle of warsaw was fought on the eastern outskirts of the city in which the capital was successfully defended and the red army defeated . EOS
SOS in the course of the UNK war of 1920 , the huge battle of warsaw was fought on the eastern outskirts of the city in which the capital was successfully defended and the red army defeated . EOS
SOS after the german invasion of poland on 1 september 1939 began the second world war , warsaw was defended till september 27 . EOS
SOS central poland , including warsaw , came under the rule of the general government , a german nazi colonial administration . EOS
SOS all higher education institutions were immediately closed and warsaw 's entire jewish population -- several hundred thousand , some 30 % of the city -- herded into the warsaw ghetto . EOS
SOS when the order came to annihilate the ghetto as part of hitler 's " final solution " on 19 april 1943 , jewish fighters launched the warsaw ghetto uprising . EOS
SOS despite being heavily outgunned and outnumbered , the ghetto held out for almost a month . EOS
SOS by july 1944 , the red army was deep into polish territory and pursuing the germans toward warsaw . EOS
SOS knowing that stalin was hostile to the idea of an independent poland , the polish government-in-exile in london gave orders to the underground home army -lrb- ak -rrb- to try to seize control of warsaw from the germans before the red army arrived . EOS
SOS thus , on 1 august 1944 , as the red army was nearing the city , the warsaw uprising began . EOS
SOS the armed struggle , planned to last 48 hours , was partially successful , however it went on for 63 days . EOS
SOS polish civilian deaths are estimated at between 150,000 and 200,000 . EOS
SOS after world war ii , under a communist regime set up by the conquering soviets , the " bricks for warsaw " campaign was initiated , and large prefabricated housing projects were erected in warsaw to address the housing shortage , along with other typical buildings of an eastern bloc city , such as the palace of culture and science , a gift from the soviet union . EOS

SOS warsaw lies in east-central poland about 300 km -lrb- 190 mi -rrb- from the carpathian mountains and about 260 km -lrb- 160 mi -rrb- from the baltic sea , 523 km -lrb- 325 mi -rrb- east of berlin , germany . EOS
SOS warsaw lies in east-central poland about 300 km -lrb- 190 mi -rrb- from the carpathian mountains and about 260 km -lrb- 160 mi -rrb- from the baltic sea , 523 km -lrb- 325 mi -rrb- east of berlin , germany . EOS
SOS the city straddles the vistula river . EOS
SOS there are some hills -lrb- mostly artificial -rrb- located within the confines of the city -- e.g . warsaw uprising hill -lrb- 121 metres -lrb- UNK ft -rrb- -rrb- , UNK hill -lrb- 138 metres -lrb- UNK ft -rrb- -- the highest point of warsaw in general -rrb- . EOS
SOS the lowest point lies at a height 75.6 metres -lrb- UNK ft -rrb- -lrb- at the right bank of the vistula , by the eastern border of warsaw -rrb- . EOS
SOS warsaw is located on two main UNK formations : the plain moraine plateau and the vistula valley with its asymmetrical pattern of different terraces . EOS
SOS warsaw is located on two main UNK formations : the plain moraine plateau and the vistula valley with its asymmetrical pattern of different terraces . EOS
SOS the left one is situated both on the moraine plateau -lrb- 10 to 25 m -lrb- UNK to UNK ft -rrb- above vistula level -rrb- and on the vistula terraces -lrb- max . EOS
SOS the vistula river is the specific axis of warsaw , which divides the city into two parts , left and right . EOS
SOS the significant element of the relief , in this part of warsaw , is the edge of moraine plateau called warsaw escarpment . EOS
SOS the plain moraine plateau has only a few natural and artificial ponds and also groups of clay pits . EOS
SOS the left side consist mainly of two levels : the highest one contains former flooded terraces and the lowest one the flood plain terrace . EOS
SOS the contemporary flooded terrace still has visible valleys and ground depressions with water systems coming from the vistula old -- riverbed . EOS
SOS these are mainly forested areas -lrb- pine forest -rrb- . EOS
SOS warsaw 's mixture of architectural styles reflects the turbulent history of the city and country . EOS
SOS during the second world war , warsaw was razed to the ground by bombing raids and planned destruction . EOS
SOS however , some of the buildings from the 19th century that had been preserved in reasonably UNK form were nonetheless eradicated in the 1950s and 1960s -lrb- e.g . leopold kronenberg palace -rrb- . EOS
SOS mass residential blocks were erected , with basic design typical of eastern bloc countries . EOS
SOS gothic architecture is represented in the majestic churches but also at the burgher houses and fortifications . EOS
SOS the most significant buildings are st. john 's cathedral -lrb- 14th century -rrb- , the temple is a typical example of the so-called masovian gothic style , st. mary 's church -lrb- UNK -rrb- , a town house of UNK family -lrb- 14th century -rrb- , gunpowder tower -lrb- after 1379 -rrb- and the royal castle curia UNK -lrb- 1407 -- 1410 -rrb- . EOS

SOS the most interesting examples of UNK architecture are the royal castle -lrb- 1596 -- 1619 -rrb- and the jesuit church -lrb- 1609 -- 1626 -rrb- at old town . EOS
SOS building activity occurred in numerous noble palaces and churches during the later decades of the 17th century . EOS
SOS one of the best examples of this architecture are krasiski palace -lrb- 1677 -- 1683 -rrb- , UNK palace -lrb- 1677 -- 1696 -rrb- and st. kazimierz church -lrb- 1688 -- 1692 -rrb- . EOS
SOS the most impressive examples of rococo architecture are UNK palace -lrb- 1712 -- 1721 -rrb- , palace of the four winds -lrb- 1730s -rrb- and UNK church -lrb- faade 1728 -- 1761 -rrb- . EOS
SOS the neoclassical architecture in warsaw can be described by the simplicity of the geometrical forms teamed with a great inspiration from the roman period . EOS
SOS some of the best examples of the neoclassical style are the palace on the water -lrb- rebuilt 1775 -- 1795 -rrb- , UNK -lrb- 1782 -- 1786 -rrb- , UNK church -lrb- faade 1761 -- 1783 -rrb- and evangelical holy trinity church -lrb- 1777 -- 1782 -rrb- . EOS

SOS legislative power in warsaw is vested in a unicameral warsaw city council -lrb- rada UNK -rrb- , which comprises 60 members . EOS

SOS if the mayor vetoes a bill , the council has 30 days to override the veto by a two-thirds majority vote . EOS

SOS the normans -lrb- norman : UNK ; french : UNK ; latin : normanni -rrb- were the people who in the 10th and 11th centuries gave their name to normandy , a region in france . EOS
SOS the normans -lrb- norman : UNK ; french : UNK ; latin : normanni -rrb- were the people who in the 10th and 11th centuries gave their name to normandy , a region in france . EOS
SOS they were descended from norse -lrb- " norman " comes from " norseman " -rrb- raiders and pirates from denmark , iceland and norway who , under their leader rollo , agreed to swear fealty to king charles iii of west francia . EOS
SOS they were descended from norse -lrb- " norman " comes from " norseman " -rrb- raiders and pirates from denmark , iceland and norway who , under their leader rollo , agreed to swear fealty to king charles iii of west francia . EOS
SOS the distinct cultural and ethnic identity of the normans emerged initially in the first half of the 10th century , and it continued to evolve over the succeeding centuries . EOS
SOS norman UNK founded the kingdom of sicily under roger ii after conquering southern italy on the saracens and byzantines , and an expedition on behalf of their duke , william the conqueror , led to the norman conquest of england at the battle of hastings in 1066 . EOS
SOS the duchy of normandy , which they formed by treaty with the french crown , was a great UNK of medieval france , and under richard i of normandy was forged into a cohesive and formidable principality in feudal tenure . EOS
SOS the normans were famed for their martial spirit and eventually for their christian piety , becoming exponents of the catholic orthodoxy into which they assimilated . EOS
SOS the english name " normans " comes from the french words UNK , plural of UNK , modern french UNK , which is itself borrowed from old low franconian UNK " UNK " or directly from old norse UNK , UNK variously as UNK , UNK , or UNK -lrb- recorded in medieval latin , 9th century -rrb- to mean " norseman , viking " . EOS
SOS the duchy of normandy , which began in 911 as a fiefdom , was established by the treaty of UNK between king charles iii of west francia and the famed viking ruler rollo , and was situated in the former frankish kingdom of neustria . EOS
SOS the duchy of normandy , which began in 911 as a fiefdom , was established by the treaty of UNK between king charles iii of west francia and the famed viking ruler rollo , and was situated in the former frankish kingdom of neustria . EOS
SOS the area corresponded to the northern part of present-day upper normandy down to the river seine , but the duchy would eventually extend west beyond the seine . EOS
SOS the descendants of rollo 's vikings and their frankish wives would replace the norse religion and old norse language with catholicism -lrb- christianity -rrb- and the gallo-romance language of the local people , blending their maternal frankish heritage with old norse traditions and customs to synthesize a unique " norman " culture in the north of france . EOS

SOS the UNK family thereafter attained the principality of UNK , and emperor henry iii legally ennobled the hauteville leader , UNK , as " UNK et magister UNK UNK UNK UNK UNK et UNK " -lrb- " duke and master of italy and count of the normans of all apulia and UNK " -rrb- in UNK . EOS
SOS he promptly awarded their elected leader , william iron arm , with the title of count in his capital of UNK . EOS
SOS from these bases , the normans eventually captured sicily and malta from the saracens , under the leadership of the famous robert guiscard , a hauteville , and his younger brother roger the great count . EOS

SOS tesla 's demonstration of his induction motor and westinghouse 's subsequent licensing of the patent , both in 1888 , put tesla firmly on the " ac " side of the so-called " war of currents , " an electrical distribution battle being waged between thomas edison and george westinghouse that had been simmering since westinghouse 's first ac system in 1886 and had reached the point of all-out warfare by 1888 . EOS

SOS starting in 1894 , tesla began investigating what he referred to as radiant energy of " invisible " kinds after he had noticed damaged film in his laboratory in previous experiments -lrb- later identified as " roentgen rays " or " x-rays " -rrb- . EOS

SOS in march 1896 , after hearing of wilhelm rntgen 's discovery of x-ray and x-ray imaging -lrb- radiography -rrb- , tesla proceeded to do his own experiments in x-ray imaging , developing a high energy single terminal vacuum tube of his own design that had no target electrode and that worked from the output of the tesla coil -lrb- the modern term for the phenomenon produced by this device is bremsstrahlung or braking radiation -rrb- . SOS on 11 july 1934 , the new york herald tribune published an article on tesla , in which he recalled an event that would occasionally take place while experimenting with his UNK vacuum tubes ; a minute particle would break off the cathode , pass out of the tube , and physically strike him . EOS
SOS on 11 july 1934 , the new york herald tribune published an article on tesla , in which he recalled an event that would occasionally take place while experimenting with his UNK vacuum tubes ; a minute particle would break off the cathode , pass out of the tube , and physically strike him . EOS
SOS " tesla said he could feel a sharp stinging pain where it entered his body , and again at the place where it passed out . " EOS
SOS in comparing these particles with the bits of metal projected by his " electric gun , " tesla said , " the particles in the beam of force ... will travel much faster than such particles ... and they will travel in concentrations . " EOS

SOS computational complexity theory is a branch of the theory of computation in theoretical computer science that focuses on classifying computational problems according to their inherent difficulty , and relating those classes to each other . EOS
SOS computational complexity theory is a branch of the theory of computation in theoretical computer science that focuses on classifying computational problems according to their inherent difficulty , and relating those classes to each other . EOS
SOS computational complexity theory is a branch of the theory of computation in theoretical computer science that focuses on classifying computational problems according to their inherent difficulty , and relating those classes to each other . EOS
SOS a problem is regarded as inherently difficult if its solution requires significant resources , whatever the algorithm used . EOS
SOS the theory formalizes this intuition , by introducing mathematical models of computation to study these problems and quantifying the amount of resources needed to solve them , such as time and storage . EOS
SOS the theory formalizes this intuition , by introducing mathematical models of computation to study these problems and quantifying the amount of resources needed to solve them , such as time and storage . EOS
SOS other complexity measures are also used , such as the amount of communication -lrb- used in communication complexity -rrb- , the number of gates in a circuit -lrb- used in circuit complexity -rrb- and the number of processors -lrb- used in parallel computing -rrb- . EOS
SOS one of the roles of computational complexity theory is to determine the practical limits on what computers can and can not do . EOS
SOS closely related fields in theoretical computer science are analysis of algorithms and computability theory . EOS
SOS closely related fields in theoretical computer science are analysis of algorithms and computability theory . EOS
SOS a key distinction between analysis of algorithms and computational complexity theory is that the former is devoted to analyzing the amount of resources needed by a particular algorithm to solve a problem , whereas the latter asks a more general question about all possible algorithms that could be used to solve the same problem . EOS
SOS closely related fields in theoretical computer science are analysis of algorithms and computability theory . EOS
SOS the input string for a computational problem is referred to as a problem instance , and should not be confused with the problem itself . EOS
SOS the input string for a computational problem is referred to as a problem instance , and should not be confused with the problem itself . EOS
SOS in contrast , an instance of this problem is a rather concrete UNK , which can serve as the input for a decision problem . EOS
SOS a computational problem can be viewed as an infinite collection of instances together with a solution for every instance . EOS
SOS a computational problem can be viewed as an infinite collection of instances together with a solution for every instance . EOS
SOS to further highlight the difference between a problem and an instance , consider the following instance of the decision version of the traveling salesman problem : is there a route of at most 2000 kilometres passing through all of germany 's 15 largest cities ? EOS
SOS the quantitative answer to this particular problem instance is of little use for solving other instances of the problem , such as asking for a round trip through all sites in milan whose total length is at most 10 km . EOS
SOS for this reason , complexity theory addresses computational problems and not particular problem instances . EOS
SOS when considering computational problems , a problem instance is a string over an alphabet . EOS
SOS usually , the alphabet is taken to be the binary alphabet -lrb- i.e . , the set -lcb- 0,1 -rcb- -rrb- , and thus the strings are UNK . EOS
SOS for example , integers can be represented in binary notation , and graphs can be encoded directly via their adjacency matrices , or by encoding their adjacency lists in binary . EOS
SOS for example , integers can be represented in binary notation , and graphs can be encoded directly via their adjacency matrices , or by encoding their adjacency lists in binary . EOS
SOS decision problems are one of the central objects of study in computational complexity theory . EOS
SOS a decision problem is a special type of computational problem whose answer is either yes or no , or alternately either 1 or 0 . EOS
SOS a decision problem is a special type of computational problem whose answer is either yes or no , or alternately either 1 or 0 . EOS
SOS a decision problem is a special type of computational problem whose answer is either yes or no , or alternately either 1 or 0 . EOS
SOS a decision problem is a special type of computational problem whose answer is either yes or no , or alternately either 1 or 0 . EOS
SOS the input is an arbitrary graph . EOS
SOS the formal language associated with this decision problem is then the set of all connected graphs -- of course , to obtain a precise definition of this language , one has to decide how graphs are encoded as binary strings . EOS

SOS a function problem is a computational problem where a single output -lrb- of a total function -rrb- is expected for every input , but the output is more complex than that of a decision problem , that is , it is n't just yes or no . EOS
SOS a function problem is a computational problem where a single output -lrb- of a total function -rrb- is expected for every input , but the output is more complex than that of a decision problem , that is , it is n't just yes or no . EOS
SOS a function problem is a computational problem where a single output -lrb- of a total function -rrb- is expected for every input , but the output is more complex than that of a decision problem , that is , it is n't just yes or no . EOS
SOS notable examples include the traveling salesman problem and the integer factorization problem . EOS
SOS a function problem is a computational problem where a single output -lrb- of a total function -rrb- is expected for every input , but the output is more complex than that of a decision problem , that is , it is n't just yes or no . EOS
SOS it is UNK to think that the notion of function problems is much richer than the notion of decision problems . EOS
SOS for example , the multiplication of two integers can be expressed as the set of UNK -lrb- a , b , c -rrb- such that the relation a b = c holds . EOS
SOS to measure the difficulty of solving a computational problem , one may wish to see how much time the best algorithm requires to solve the problem . EOS
SOS however , the running time may , in general , depend on the instance . EOS
SOS thus the time required to solve a problem -lrb- or the space required , or any measure of complexity -rrb- is calculated as a function of the size of the instance . EOS
SOS this is usually taken to be the size of the input in bits . EOS
SOS complexity theory is interested in how algorithms scale with an increase in the input size . EOS
SOS cobham 's thesis says that a problem can be solved with a feasible amount of resources if it admits a polynomial time algorithm . EOS
SOS if the input size is n , the time taken can be expressed as a function of n . EOS
SOS since the time taken on different inputs of the same size can be different , the worst-case time complexity t -lrb- n -rrb- is defined to be the maximum time taken over all inputs of size n . EOS
SOS since the time taken on different inputs of the same size can be different , the worst-case time complexity t -lrb- n -rrb- is defined to be the maximum time taken over all inputs of size n . EOS
SOS if t -lrb- n -rrb- is a polynomial in n , then the algorithm is said to be a polynomial time algorithm . EOS
SOS a turing machine is a mathematical model of a general computing machine . EOS
SOS it is believed that if a problem can be solved by an algorithm , there exists a turing machine that solves the problem . EOS
SOS since turing machines are easy to analyze mathematically , and are believed to be as powerful as any other model of computation , the turing machine is the most commonly used model in complexity theory . EOS
SOS it is a theoretical device that manipulates symbols contained on a strip of tape . EOS
SOS a deterministic turing machine is the most basic turing machine , which uses a fixed set of rules to determine its future actions . EOS
SOS a deterministic turing machine is the most basic turing machine , which uses a fixed set of rules to determine its future actions . EOS
SOS a probabilistic turing machine is a deterministic turing machine with an extra supply of random bits . EOS
SOS a non-deterministic turing machine is a deterministic turing machine with an added feature of UNK , which allows a turing machine to have multiple possible future actions from a given state . EOS
SOS algorithms that use random bits are called UNK algorithms . EOS
SOS many types of turing machines are used to define complexity classes , such as deterministic turing machines , probabilistic turing machines , non-deterministic turing machines , quantum turing machines , symmetric turing machines and alternating turing machines . EOS
SOS they are all equally powerful in principle , but when resources -lrb- such as time or space -rrb- are bounded , some of these may be more powerful than others . EOS
SOS many types of turing machines are used to define complexity classes , such as deterministic turing machines , probabilistic turing machines , non-deterministic turing machines , quantum turing machines , symmetric turing machines and alternating turing machines . EOS
SOS many machine models different from the standard multi-tape turing machines have been proposed in the literature , for example random access machines . EOS
SOS perhaps surprisingly , each of these models can be converted to another without providing any extra computational power . EOS
SOS the time and memory consumption of these alternate models may vary . EOS
SOS what all these models have in common is that the machines operate UNK . EOS
SOS for example , a non-deterministic turing machine is a computational model that is allowed to branch out to check many different possibilities at once . EOS
SOS however , some computational problems are easier to analyze in terms of more unusual resources . EOS
SOS the non-deterministic turing machine has very little to do with how we physically want to compute algorithms , but its branching exactly captures many of the mathematical models we want to analyze , so that non-deterministic time is a very important resource in analyzing computational problems . SOS for instance , the set of problems solvable within time f -lrb- n -rrb- on a deterministic turing machine is then denoted by dtime -lrb- f -lrb- n -rrb- -rrb- . EOS
SOS for a precise definition of what it means to solve a problem using a given amount of time and space , a computational model such as the deterministic turing machine is used . EOS

SOS to classify the computation time -lrb- or similar resources , such as space consumption -rrb- , one is interested in proving upper and lower bounds on the minimum amount of time required by the most efficient algorithm solving a given problem . EOS
SOS analyzing a particular algorithm falls under the field of analysis of algorithms . EOS
SOS to classify the computation time -lrb- or similar resources , such as space consumption -rrb- , one is interested in proving upper and lower bounds on the minimum amount of time required by the most efficient algorithm solving a given problem . EOS
SOS to show an upper bound t -lrb- n -rrb- on the time complexity of a problem , one needs to show only that there is a particular algorithm with running time at most t -lrb- n -rrb- . EOS
SOS however , proving lower bounds is much more difficult , since lower bounds make a statement about all possible algorithms that solve a given problem . EOS
SOS upper and lower bounds are usually stated using the big o notation , which hides constant factors and smaller terms . EOS
SOS upper and lower bounds are usually stated using the big o notation , which hides constant factors and smaller terms . EOS
SOS for instance , if t -lrb- n -rrb- = UNK + UNK + 40 , in big o notation one would write t -lrb- n -rrb- = o -lrb- n2 -rrb- . EOS
SOS this makes the bounds independent of the specific details of the computational model used . EOS
SOS of course , some complexity classes have complicated definitions that do not fit into this framework . EOS
SOS of course , some complexity classes have complicated definitions that do not fit into this framework . EOS

SOS but bounding the computation time above by some concrete function f -lrb- n -rrb- often yields complexity classes that depend on the chosen machine model . EOS
SOS for instance , the language -lcb- xx | x is any binary string -rcb- can be solved in linear time on a multi-tape turing machine , but necessarily requires quadratic time in the model of UNK turing machines . EOS

SOS # p is an important complexity class of counting problems -lrb- not decision problems -rrb- . EOS
SOS classes like ip and am are defined using interactive proof systems . EOS
SOS for the complexity classes defined in this way , it is desirable to prove that relaxing the requirements on -lrb- say -rrb- computation time indeed defines a bigger set of problems . EOS
SOS in particular , although dtime -lrb- n -rrb- is contained in dtime -lrb- n2 -rrb- , it would be interesting to know if the inclusion is strict . EOS
SOS for time and space requirements , the answer to such questions is given by the time and space hierarchy theorems respectively . EOS
SOS they are called hierarchy theorems because they induce a proper hierarchy on the classes defined by constraining the respective resources . EOS
SOS having deduced such proper set inclusions , we can proceed to make quantitative statements about how much more additional time or space is needed in order to increase the number of problems that can be solved . EOS
SOS the time and space hierarchy theorems form the basis for most separation results of complexity classes . EOS
SOS for instance , the time hierarchy theorem tells us that p is strictly contained in UNK , and the space hierarchy theorem tells us that l is strictly contained in pspace . EOS
SOS for instance , the time hierarchy theorem tells us that p is strictly contained in UNK , and the space hierarchy theorem tells us that l is strictly contained in pspace . EOS
SOS many complexity classes are defined using the concept of a reduction . EOS
SOS a reduction is a transformation of one problem into another problem . EOS
SOS for instance , if a problem x can be solved using an algorithm for y , x is no more difficult than y , and we say that x reduces to y . EOS
SOS there are many different types of reductions , based on the method of reduction , such as cook reductions , karp reductions and levin reductions , and the bound on the complexity of reductions , such as polynomial-time reductions or UNK reductions . EOS
SOS there are many different types of reductions , based on the method of reduction , such as cook reductions , karp reductions and levin reductions , and the bound on the complexity of reductions , such as polynomial-time reductions or UNK reductions . EOS
SOS the most commonly used reduction is a polynomial-time reduction . EOS
SOS for example , the problem of UNK an integer can be reduced to the problem of multiplying two integers . EOS
SOS this means that the reduction process takes polynomial time . EOS
SOS indeed , this can be done by giving the same input to both inputs of the multiplication algorithm . EOS
SOS a problem x is hard for a class of problems c if every problem in c can be reduced to x. thus no problem in c is harder than x , since an algorithm for x allows us to solve any problem in c. of course , the notion of hard problems depends on the type of reduction being used . EOS

SOS the complexity class p is often seen as a mathematical abstraction modeling those computational tasks that admit an efficient algorithm . EOS
SOS this hypothesis is called the cobham -- edmonds thesis . EOS
SOS the complexity class np , on the other hand , contains many problems that people would like to solve efficiently , but for which no efficient algorithm is known , such as the boolean satisfiability problem , the hamiltonian path problem and the vertex cover problem . EOS
SOS the complexity class np , on the other hand , contains many problems that people would like to solve efficiently , but for which no efficient algorithm is known , such as the boolean satisfiability problem , the hamiltonian path problem and the vertex cover problem . EOS
SOS since deterministic turing machines are special non-deterministic turing machines , it is easily observed that each problem in p is also member of the class np . EOS
SOS if the answer is yes , many important problems can be shown to have more efficient solutions . EOS
SOS these include various types of integer programming problems in operations research , many problems in logistics , protein structure prediction in biology , and the ability to find formal proofs of pure mathematics theorems . EOS
SOS there is a us $ 1,000,000 prize for resolving the problem . EOS
SOS it was shown by UNK that if p np then there exist problems in np that are neither in p nor np-complete . EOS
SOS the graph isomorphism problem , the discrete logarithm problem and the integer factorization problem are examples of problems believed to be UNK . EOS
SOS the graph isomorphism problem is the computational problem of determining whether two finite graphs are isomorphic . EOS
SOS an important unsolved problem in complexity theory is whether the graph isomorphism problem is in p , np-complete , or UNK . EOS
SOS if graph isomorphism is np-complete , the polynomial time hierarchy collapses to its second level . EOS
SOS if graph isomorphism is np-complete , the polynomial time hierarchy collapses to its second level . EOS
SOS the best algorithm for this problem , due to UNK UNK and eugene UNK has run time 2o -lrb- -lrb- n log -lrb- n -rrb- -rrb- -rrb- for graphs with n UNK . EOS
SOS the integer factorization problem is the computational problem of determining the prime factorization of a given integer . EOS
SOS phrased as a decision problem , it is the problem of deciding whether the input has a factor less than k. no efficient integer factorization algorithm is known , and this fact forms the basis of several modern UNK systems , such as the rsa algorithm . EOS
SOS phrased as a decision problem , it is the problem of deciding whether the input has a factor less than k. no efficient integer factorization algorithm is known , and this fact forms the basis of several modern UNK systems , such as the rsa algorithm . EOS
SOS the best known algorithm for integer factorization is the general number field sieve , which takes time o -lrb- e -lrb- UNK -rrb- 1/3 -lrb- UNK 2 -rrb- 1/3 -lrb- log -lrb- UNK 2 -rrb- -rrb- 2/3 -rrb- to factor an UNK integer . EOS
SOS many known complexity classes are suspected to be unequal , but this has not been proved . EOS
SOS since there are many known complexity classes between p and pspace , such as rp , bpp , pp , bqp , ma , ph , etc . , it is possible that all these complexity classes collapse to one class . EOS
SOS proving that any of these classes are unequal would be a major breakthrough in complexity theory . EOS
SOS along the same lines , co-np is the class containing the complement problems -lrb- i.e . problems with the UNK answers reversed -rrb- of np problems . EOS
SOS along the same lines , co-np is the class containing the complement problems -lrb- i.e . problems with the UNK answers reversed -rrb- of np problems . EOS
SOS it is believed that np is not equal to co-np ; however , it has not yet been proven . EOS
SOS it has been shown that if these two complexity classes are not equal then p is not equal to np . EOS
SOS similarly , it is not known if l -lrb- the set of all problems that can be solved in logarithmic space -rrb- is strictly contained in p or equal to p. again , there are many complexity classes between the two , such as nl and nc , and it is not known if they are distinct or equal classes . EOS

SOS problems that can be solved in theory -lrb- e.g . , given large but finite time -rrb- , but which in practice take too long for their solutions to be useful , are known as intractable problems . EOS
SOS if np is not the same as p , then the np-complete problems are also intractable in this sense . EOS
SOS for example , the decision problem in presburger arithmetic has been shown not to be in p , yet algorithms have been written that solve the problem in reasonable times in most cases . EOS

SOS perhaps the most significant difference between primary school and secondary school teaching is the relationship between teachers and children . EOS
SOS in primary schools each class has a teacher who stays with them for most of the week and will teach them the whole curriculum . EOS
SOS in secondary schools they will be taught by different subject specialists each session during the week and may have ten or more different teachers . EOS
SOS perhaps the most significant difference between primary school and secondary school teaching is the relationship between teachers and children . EOS
SOS the relationship between children and their teachers tends to be closer in the primary school where they act as form tutor , specialist teacher and surrogate parent during the course of the day . EOS
SOS however , alternative approaches for primary education do exist . EOS
SOS one of these , sometimes referred to as a " platoon " system , involves placing a group of students together in one class that moves from one specialist to another for every subject . EOS
SOS students still derive a strong sense of security by staying with the same group of peers for all classes . EOS
SOS the advantage here is that students learn from teachers who specialize in one subject and who tend to be more UNK in that one area than a teacher who teaches many subjects . EOS

SOS martin luther -lrb- / lur / or / lur / ; german : -lsb- UNK lt -rsb- -lrb- listen -rrb- ; 10 november 1483 -- 18 february 1546 -rrb- was a german professor of theology , composer , priest , former monk and a seminal figure in the protestant reformation . EOS
SOS luther came to reject several teachings and practices of the late medieval catholic church . EOS
SOS he strongly disputed the claim that freedom from god 's punishment for sin could be purchased with money . EOS
SOS his refusal to retract all of his writings at the demand of pope leo x in 1520 and the holy roman emperor charles v at the diet of worms in 1521 resulted in his excommunication by the pope and condemnation as an outlaw by the emperor . EOS
SOS luther taught that salvation and subsequently eternal life is not earned by good deeds but is received only as a free gift of god 's grace through faith in jesus christ as redeemer from sin . EOS
SOS luther taught that salvation and subsequently eternal life is not earned by good deeds but is received only as a free gift of god 's grace through faith in jesus christ as redeemer from sin . EOS
SOS his theology challenged the authority and office of the pope by teaching that the bible is the only source of divinely revealed knowledge from god and opposed sacerdotalism by considering all baptized christians to be a holy priesthood . EOS
SOS his theology challenged the authority and office of the pope by teaching that the bible is the only source of divinely revealed knowledge from god and opposed sacerdotalism by considering all baptized christians to be a holy priesthood . EOS
SOS his theology challenged the authority and office of the pope by teaching that the bible is the only source of divinely revealed knowledge from god and opposed sacerdotalism by considering all baptized christians to be a holy priesthood . EOS
SOS his translation of the bible into the vernacular -lrb- instead of latin -rrb- made it more accessible , which had a tremendous impact on the church and german culture . EOS
SOS it fostered the development of a standard version of the german language , added several principles to the art of translation , and influenced the writing of an english translation , the tyndale bible . EOS
SOS it fostered the development of a standard version of the german language , added several principles to the art of translation , and influenced the writing of an english translation , the tyndale bible . EOS
SOS his hymns influenced the development of singing in churches . EOS
SOS his marriage to katharina von bora set a model for the practice of clerical marriage , allowing protestant clergy to marry . EOS

SOS the extant manuscript shows multiple revisions , demonstrating luther 's concern to clarify and strengthen the text and to provide an appropriately UNK tune . EOS
SOS other 16th - and 20th-century UNK of the lord 's prayer have adopted luther 's tune , although modern texts are considerably shorter . EOS
SOS luther wrote " aus tiefer not schrei ich zu dir " -lrb- " from depths of woe i cry to you " -rrb- in 1523 as a hymnic version of psalm 130 and sent it as a sample to encourage evangelical colleagues to write UNK for use in german worship . EOS
SOS luther wrote " aus tiefer not schrei ich zu dir " -lrb- " from depths of woe i cry to you " -rrb- in 1523 as a hymnic version of psalm 130 and sent it as a sample to encourage evangelical colleagues to write UNK for use in german worship . EOS
SOS in a collaboration with paul UNK , this and seven other hymns were published in the achtliederbuch , the first lutheran hymnal . EOS
SOS because it expressed essential reformation doctrine , this expanded version of " aus tiefer not " was designated as a regular component of several regional lutheran liturgies and was widely used at funerals , including luther 's own . EOS

SOS in contrast to the views of john calvin and philipp melanchthon , throughout his life luther maintained that it was not false doctrine to believe that a christian 's soul UNK after it is separated from the body in death ; and , accordingly , he disputed traditional interpretations of some bible passages , such as the UNK of the rich man and lazarus . SOS these theses asserted that the law is no longer to be taught to christians but belonged only to city hall . EOS
SOS luther responded to these theses with six series of theses against agricola and the antinomians , four of which became the basis for disputations between 1538 and 1540 . EOS
SOS he also responded to these assertions in other writings , such as his 1539 open letter to c. UNK against the antinomians , and his book on the councils and the church from the same year . EOS
SOS in his theses and disputations against the antinomians , luther reviews and reaffirms , on the one hand , what has been called the " second use of the law , " that is , the law as the holy spirit 's tool to work sorrow over sin in man 's heart , thus preparing him for christ 's fulfillment of the law offered in the gospel . SOS in his theses and disputations against the antinomians , luther reviews and reaffirms , on the one hand , what has been called the " second use of the law , " that is , the law as the holy spirit 's tool to work sorrow over sin in man 's heart , thus preparing him for christ 's fulfillment of the law offered in the gospel . EOS
SOS luther states that everything that is used to work sorrow over sin is called the law , even if it is christ 's life , christ 's death for sin , or god 's goodness experienced in creation . EOS
SOS simply refusing to preach the ten commandments among christians -- thereby , as it were , removing the three letters UNK from the church -- does not eliminate the accusing law . EOS
SOS claiming that the law -- in any form -- should not be preached to christians anymore would be tantamount to asserting that christians are no longer sinners in themselves and that the church consists only of essentially holy people . EOS
SOS on the other hand , luther also points out that the ten commandments -- when considered not as god 's condemning judgment but as an expression of his eternal will , that is , of the natural law -- also positively teach how the christian ought to live . EOS
SOS on the other hand , luther also points out that the ten commandments -- when considered not as god 's condemning judgment but as an expression of his eternal will , that is , of the natural law -- also positively teach how the christian ought to live . EOS
SOS this has traditionally been called the " third use of the law . " EOS

UNK in his book demonizing the jews : luther and the protestant church in nazi germany -lrb- 2012 -rrb- , shows that a large number of german lutheran clergy and theologians during the nazi third reich used luther 's hostile publications towards the jews and their jewish religion to justify at least in part the anti-semitic policies of the national socialists . SOS victoria -lrb- abbreviated as vic -rrb- is a state in the south-east of australia . EOS
SOS victoria is australia 's most densely populated state and its second-most populous state overall . EOS
SOS victoria is australia 's most densely populated state and its second-most populous state overall . EOS
SOS most of its population is concentrated in the area surrounding port phillip bay , which includes the metropolitan area of its capital and largest city , melbourne , which is australia 's second-largest city . EOS

SOS prior to european settlement , the area now constituting victoria was inhabited by a large number of aboriginal peoples , collectively known as the UNK . EOS
SOS with great britain having claimed the entire australian continent east of the 135th meridian east in 1788 , victoria was included in the wider colony of new south wales . EOS

SOS more than 26,000 square kilometres -lrb- 10,000 sq mi -rrb- of victorian farmland are sown for grain , mostly in the state 's west . EOS
SOS more than 50 % of this area is sown for wheat , 33 % for barley and 7 % for oats . EOS
SOS a further 6,000 square kilometres -lrb- 2,300 sq mi -rrb- is sown for hay . EOS
SOS victorian farms produce nearly 90 % of australian pears and third of apples . EOS
SOS last year , UNK tonnes of pears and 270,000 tonnes of tomatoes were produced . EOS
SOS victoria has a written constitution enacted in 1975 , but based on the 1855 colonial constitution , passed by the united kingdom parliament as the victoria constitution act 1855 , which establishes the parliament as the state 's law-making body for matters coming under state responsibility . EOS
SOS victoria has a written constitution enacted in 1975 , but based on the 1855 colonial constitution , passed by the united kingdom parliament as the victoria constitution act 1855 , which establishes the parliament as the state 's law-making body for matters coming under state responsibility . EOS
SOS the victorian constitution can be amended by the parliament of victoria , except for certain " entrenched " provisions that require either an absolute majority in both houses , a three-fifths majority in both houses , or the approval of the victorian people in a referendum , depending on the provision . SOS historically , victoria has been the base for the manufacturing plants of the major car brands ford , toyota and holden ; however , closure announcements by all three companies in the 21st century will mean that australia will no longer be a base for the global car industry , with toyota 's statement in february 2014 outlining a closure year of 2017 . SOS victoria contains many topographically , geologically and climatically diverse areas , ranging from the wet , temperate climate of gippsland in the southeast to the snow-covered victorian alpine areas which rise to almost 2,000 m -lrb- 6,600 ft -rrb- , with mount bogong the highest peak at 1,986 m -lrb- 6,516 ft -rrb- . SOS steam turbines are generally more efficient than reciprocating piston type steam engines -lrb- for outputs above several hundred horsepower -rrb- , have fewer moving parts , and provide rotary power directly instead of through a connecting rod system or similar means . EOS

SOS the heat required for boiling the water and supplying the steam can be derived from various sources , most commonly from burning combustible materials with an appropriate supply of air in a closed space -lrb- called variously combustion chamber , firebox -rrb- . EOS
SOS in some cases the heat source is a nuclear reactor , geothermal energy , solar energy or waste heat from an internal combustion engine or industrial process . EOS
SOS in the case of model or toy steam engines , the heat source can be an electric heating element . EOS

SOS uniflow engines attempt to remedy the difficulties arising from the usual UNK cycle where , during each stroke , the port and the cylinder walls will be cooled by the passing exhaust steam , whilst the hotter incoming admission steam will waste some of its energy in restoring working temperature . EOS
SOS the aim of the uniflow is to remedy this defect and improve efficiency by providing an additional port uncovered by the piston at the end of each stroke making the steam flow only in one direction . EOS

SOS the historical measure of a steam engine 's energy efficiency was its " duty " . EOS
SOS watt 's original low-pressure designs were able to deliver duty as high as 25 million , but averaged about 17 . EOS
SOS the best examples of newcomen designs had a duty of about 7 million , but most were closer to 5 million . EOS
SOS duty is the number of UNK of work delivered by burning one UNK -lrb- 94 pounds -rrb- of coal . EOS
SOS the concept of duty was first introduced by watt in order to illustrate how much more efficient his engines were over the earlier newcomen designs . EOS

SOS the unusually high concentration of oxygen gas on earth is the result of the oxygen cycle . EOS
SOS this biogeochemical cycle describes the movement of oxygen within and between its three main reservoirs on earth : the atmosphere , the biosphere , and the lithosphere . EOS
SOS this biogeochemical cycle describes the movement of oxygen within and between its three main reservoirs on earth : the atmosphere , the biosphere , and the lithosphere . EOS
SOS the main driving factor of the oxygen cycle is photosynthesis , which is responsible for modern earth 's atmosphere . EOS
SOS photosynthesis releases oxygen into the atmosphere , while respiration and decay remove it from the atmosphere . EOS

SOS oxygen toxicity to the lungs and central nervous system can also occur in deep scuba diving and surface supplied diving . EOS
SOS prolonged breathing of an air mixture with an o 2 partial pressure more than 60 kpa can eventually lead to permanent pulmonary fibrosis . EOS
SOS exposure to a o 2 partial pressures greater than 160 kpa -lrb- about 1.6 atm -rrb- may lead to convulsions -lrb- normally fatal for divers -rrb- . EOS
SOS acute oxygen toxicity -lrb- causing seizures , its most feared effect for divers -rrb- can occur by breathing an air mixture with 21 % o 2 at 66 m or more of depth ; the same thing can occur by breathing 100 % o 2 at only 6 m . EOS

SOS breathing pure o 2 in space applications , such as in some modern space suits , or in early spacecraft such as apollo , causes no damage due to the low total pressures used . EOS
SOS in the case of spacesuits , the o 2 partial pressure in the breathing gas is , in general , about 30 kpa -lrb- 1.4 times normal -rrb- , and the resulting o 2 partial pressure in the astronaut 's arterial blood is only marginally more than normal sea-level o 2 partial pressure -lrb- for more information on this , see space suit and arterial blood gas -rrb- . SOS the 1973 oil crisis began in october 1973 when the members of the organization of arab petroleum exporting countries -lrb- UNK , consisting of the arab members of opec plus egypt and syria -rrb- proclaimed an oil embargo . EOS

SOS the 1973 oil crisis began in october 1973 when the members of the organization of arab petroleum exporting countries -lrb- UNK , consisting of the arab members of opec plus egypt and syria -rrb- proclaimed an oil embargo . EOS
SOS some european nations and japan sought to UNK themselves from united states foreign policy in the middle east to avoid being targeted by the boycott . EOS
SOS by january 18 , 1974 , us secretary of state henry kissinger had negotiated an israeli troop withdrawal from parts of the sinai peninsula . EOS
SOS the promise of a negotiated settlement between israel and syria was enough to convince arab oil producers to lift the embargo in march 1974 . EOS
SOS on august 15 , 1971 , the united states unilaterally pulled out of the bretton woods accord . EOS
SOS the us abandoned the gold exchange standard whereby the value of the dollar had been pegged to the price of gold and all other currencies were pegged to the dollar , whose value was left to " float " -lrb- rise and fall according to market demand -rrb- . EOS
SOS anticipating that currency values would fluctuate UNK for a time , the industrialized nations increased their reserves -lrb- by expanding their money supplies -rrb- in amounts far greater than before . EOS
SOS in september 1971 , opec issued a joint UNK stating that , from then on , they would price oil in terms of a fixed amount of gold . EOS
SOS because oil was priced in dollars , oil producers ' real income decreased . EOS
SOS from 1947 to 1967 , the dollar price of oil had risen by less than two percent per year . EOS
SOS after 1971 , opec was slow to UNK prices to reflect this UNK . EOS
SOS the substantial price increases of 1973 -- 1974 largely returned their prices and corresponding incomes to bretton woods levels in terms of commodities such as gold . EOS
SOS until the oil shock , the price had also remained fairly stable versus other currencies and commodities . EOS

SOS european union law is a body of treaties and legislation , such as regulations and directives , which have direct effect or indirect effect on the laws of european union member states . EOS
SOS the main sources of primary law are the treaties establishing the european union . EOS
SOS secondary sources include regulations and directives which are based on the treaties . EOS

SOS the eu 's primary constitutional sources are the treaty on european union -lrb- teu -rrb- and the treaty on the functioning of the european union -lrb- tfeu -rrb- , which have been agreed or adhered to among the governments of all 28 member states . EOS
SOS the european commission has the initiative to propose legislation . EOS
SOS during the ordinary legislative procedure , the council -lrb- which are ministers from member state governments -rrb- and the european parliament -lrb- elected by citizens -rrb- can make amendments and must give their consent for laws to pass . EOS
SOS the european court of justice is the supreme judicial body which interprets eu law , and develops it through precedent . EOS
SOS the " european council " -lrb- rather than the council , made up of different government ministers -rrb- is composed of the prime ministers or executive presidents of the member states . EOS
SOS the primary law of the eu consists mainly of the founding treaties , the " core " treaties being the treaty on european union -lrb- teu -rrb- and the treaty on the functioning of the european union -lrb- tfeu -rrb- . EOS
SOS the teu specifically excludes certain regions , for example the UNK islands , from the jurisdiction of european union law . EOS
SOS the court of justice of the european union can interpret the treaties , but it can not rule on their validity , which is subject to international law . EOS
SOS individuals may rely on primary law in the court of justice of the european union if the treaty provisions have a direct effect and they are sufficiently clear , precise and unconditional . EOS
SOS treaties apply as soon as they enter into force , unless stated otherwise , and are generally concluded for an unlimited period . EOS

SOS the european commission is the main executive body of the european union . EOS
SOS this means that the commission has a monopoly on initiating the legislative procedure , although the council is the " de facto catalyst of many legislative initiatives " . EOS

SOS while the commission has a monopoly on initiating legislation , the european parliament and the council of the european union have powers of amendment and veto during the legislative process . EOS
SOS in practice , equality and democracy are deficient because the elected representatives in the parliament can not initiate legislation against the commission 's wishes , citizens of smallest countries have ten times the voting weight in parliament as citizens of the largest countries , and " qualified majorities " or consensus of the council are required to legislate . EOS
SOS parliament elections , take place every five years , and votes for members of the european parliament in member states must be organised by proportional representation or a single transferable vote . EOS
SOS it can require the commission respond to questions and by a two-thirds majority can censure the whole commission -lrb- as happened to the santer commission in 1999 -rrb- . EOS
SOS however its role participation in the legislative process still remains limited because no member can actually or pass legislation without the commission and council , meaning power -lrb- " UNK " -rrb- is not in the hands of directly elected representatives of the people -lrb- " demos " -rrb- : in the eu it is not yet true that " the administration is in the hands of the many and not of the few . SOS over time , this has meant the parliament gradually assumed more voice : from being an UNK assembly , to its first direct elections in 1979 , to having increasingly more rights in the legislative process . EOS
SOS parliament elections , take place every five years , and votes for members of the european parliament in member states must be organised by proportional representation or a single transferable vote . EOS
SOS meps divide , as they do in national parliaments , along political party lines : the conservative european people 's party is currently the largest , and the party of european socialists leads the opposition . EOS
SOS the second main legislative body is the council , which is composed of different ministers of the member states . EOS
SOS it meets each six months and its president -lrb- currently former poland prime minister donald UNK -rrb- is meant to ` drive forward its work ' , but it does not itself ` legislative functions ' . EOS
SOS when voting takes place it is weighted inversely to member state size , so smaller member states are not dominated by larger member states . EOS
SOS in total there are 352 votes , but for most acts there must be a qualified majority vote , if not consensus . EOS
SOS teu article 16 -lrb- 4 -rrb- and tfeu article 238 -lrb- 3 -rrb- define this to mean at least 55 per cent of the council members -lrb- not votes -rrb- representing 65 per cent of the population of the eu : currently this means around 74 per cent , or 260 of the 352 votes . EOS

EOS
SOS this means , legislation can be blocked by a majority in parliament , a minority in the council , and a majority in the commission : it is harder to change eu law than stay the same . EOS
SOS teu articles 4 and 5 state that powers remain with the member states unless they have been conferred , although there is a debate about the kompetenz-kompetenz question : who ultimately has the " competence " to define the eu 's " competence " . EOS
SOS many member state courts believe they decide , other member state parliaments believe they decide , while within the eu , the court of justice believes it has the final say . EOS

SOS where the different institutions can not agree at any stage , a " conciliation committee " is convened , representing meps , ministers and the commission to try and get agreement on a joint text : if this works , it will be sent back to the parliament and council to approve by absolute and qualified majority . SOS the judicial branch of the eu has played an important role in the development of eu law , by assuming the task of interpreting the treaties , and accelerating economic and political integration . EOS
SOS today the court of justice of the european union -lrb- cjeu -rrb- is the main judicial body , within which there is a higher european court of justice -lrb- commonly abbreviated as ecj -rrb- that deals with cases that contain more public importance , and a general court that deals with issues of detail but without general importance . EOS
SOS in fact , most eu law is applied by member state courts -lrb- the english court of appeal , the german UNK , the belgian UNK du travail , etc . -rrb- but they can refer questions to the eu court for a preliminary ruling . EOS
SOS the cjeu 's duty is to " ensure that in the interpretation and application of the treaties the law is observed " , although realistically it has the ability to expand and develop the law according to the principles it deems to be appropriate . EOS

SOS today the court of justice of the european union -lrb- cjeu -rrb- is the main judicial body , within which there is a higher european court of justice -lrb- commonly abbreviated as ecj -rrb- that deals with cases that contain more public importance , and a general court that deals with issues of detail but without general importance . EOS
SOS there is also a civil service tribunal to deal with eu staff issues , and then a separate court of auditors . EOS
SOS a president is elected by the judges for three years . EOS
SOS the cjeu 's duty is to " ensure that in the interpretation and application of the treaties the law is observed " , although realistically it has the ability to expand and develop the law according to the principles it deems to be appropriate . EOS
SOS within the eu itself , the court of justice 's view is that if eu law conflicts with a provision of national law , then eu law has primacy . EOS
SOS the italian constitutional court gave an opinion that because the nationalisation law was from 1962 , and the treaty was in force from 1958 , costa had no claim . EOS
SOS similarly , in UNK delle UNK v UNK spa , a company , UNK spa , claimed that a public health inspection fee under an italian law of 1970 for importing beef from france to italy was contrary to two regulations from 1964 and 1968 . EOS
SOS this has meant both the european court of justice and the highest national courts have had to develop principles to resolve conflicts of laws between different systems . EOS
SOS in the first major case in 1964 , costa v enel , a milanese lawyer , and former shareholder of an energy company , named mr costa refused to pay his electricity bill to enel , as a protest against the nationalisation of the italian energy corporations . EOS
SOS by contrast , the court of justice held that ultimately the treaty of rome in no way prevented energy nationalisation , and in any case under the treaty provisions only the commission could have brought a claim , not mr costa . EOS
SOS generally speaking , while all member states recognise that eu law takes primacy over national law where this agreed in the treaties , they do not accept that the court of justice has the final say on foundational constitutional questions affecting democracy and human rights . EOS
SOS generally speaking , while all member states recognise that eu law takes primacy over national law where this agreed in the treaties , they do not accept that the court of justice has the final say on foundational constitutional questions affecting democracy and human rights . EOS
SOS more recently the uk supreme court noted that in r -lrb- UNK action alliance ltd -rrb- v secretary of state for transport , although the uk constitution is uncodified , there could be " fundamental principles " of common law , and parliament " did not either UNK or authorise the abrogation " of those principles when it enacted the european communities act 1972 . EOS
SOS this suggests the eu 's legitimacy rests on the ultimate authority of member states , its factual commitment to human rights , and the democratic will of the people . EOS
SOS the view of the german constitutional court from the solange i and solange ii decisions is that if the eu does not comply with its basic constitutional rights and principles -lrb- particularly democracy , the rule of law and the social state principles -rrb- then it can not override german law . EOS
SOS while constitutional law concerns the european union 's governance structure , administrative law binds eu institutions and member states to follow the law . EOS
SOS however , under directives , citizens or corporations were said in 1986 to not be allowed to bring claims against other non-state parties . EOS
SOS all actions by eu institutions can be subject to judicial review , and judged by standards of proportionality , particularly where general principles of law , or fundamental rights are engaged . EOS
SOS while constitutional law concerns the european union 's governance structure , administrative law binds eu institutions and member states to follow the law . EOS
SOS in van gend en loos v UNK UNK der UNK it was held that the provisions of the treaties -lrb- and eu regulations -rrb- are directly effective , if they are -lrb- 1 -rrb- clear and unambiguous -lrb- 2 -rrb- unconditional , and -lrb- 3 -rrb- did not require eu or national authorities to take further action to implement them . EOS
SOS because article 30 clearly , unconditionally and immediately stated that no quantitative restrictions could be placed on trade , without a good justification , van gend en loos could recover the money it paid for the tariff . EOS
SOS van gend en loos , a postal company , claimed that what is now tfeu article 30 prevented the dutch customs authorities charging tariffs , when it imported UNK plastics from germany to the netherlands . EOS
SOS eu regulations are the same as treaty provisions in this sense , because as tfeu article 288 states , they are ` directly applicable in all member states ' . EOS
SOS while the treaties and regulations will have direct effect -lrb- if clear , unconditional and immediate -rrb- , directives do not generally give citizens -lrb- as opposed to the member state -rrb- standing to sue other citizens . EOS
SOS for example , the working time directive requires that every worker has at least 4 weeks paid holidays each year , but most member states require more than 28 days in national law . EOS
SOS for example , the working time directive requires that every worker has at least 4 weeks paid holidays each year , but most member states require more than 28 days in national law . EOS
SOS this view was instantly controversial , and in the early 1990s three advocate generals UNK argued that directives should create rights and duties for all citizens . EOS
SOS first , if a directive 's deadline for implementation is not met , the member state can not enforce conflicting laws , and a citizen may rely on the directive in such an action -lrb- so called " vertical " direct effect -rrb- . EOS
SOS second , a citizen or company can invoke a directive , not just in a dispute with a public authority , but in a dispute with another citizen or company . EOS
SOS ms UNK worked for 10 years , from age 18 to 28 , for UNK UNK & co kg before her dismissal . EOS
SOS in foster v british gas plc the court of justice held that mrs foster was entitled to bring a sex discrimination claim against her employer , british gas plc , which made women retire at age 60 and men at 65 , if -lrb- 1 -rrb- pursuant to a state measure , -lrb- 2 -rrb- it provided a public service , and -lrb- 3 -rrb- had special powers . EOS

EOS
SOS fourth , national courts have a duty to interpret domestic law " as far as possible in the light of the wording and purpose of the directive " . EOS
SOS in UNK sa v la UNK sa the court of justice held that a spanish court had to interpret its general civil code provisions , on contracts lacking cause or UNK creditors , to conform with the first company law directive article 11 , that required UNK would only be nullified for a fixed list of reasons . EOS
SOS so , in UNK v italy , the italian government had failed to set up an insurance fund for employees to claim unpaid wages if their employers had gone insolvent , as the insolvency protection directive required . EOS
SOS UNK , the former employee of a bankrupt venetian firm , was therefore allowed to claim 6 million UNK from the italian government in damages for his loss . EOS
SOS the principles of european union law are rules of law which have been developed by the european court of justice that constitute unwritten rules which are not expressly provided for in the treaties but which affect how european union law is interpreted and applies . EOS
SOS accepted general principles of european union law include fundamental rights -lrb- see human rights -rrb- , proportionality , legal certainty , equality before the law and UNK . EOS
SOS proportionality is recognised one of the general principles of european union law by the european court of justice since the 1950s . EOS
SOS the principle of proportionality is also recognised in article 5 of the ec treaty , stating that " any action by the community shall not go beyond what is necessary to achieve the objectives of this treaty " . EOS
SOS when there is a choice between several appropriate measures the least UNK must be adopted , and any disadvantage caused must not be disproportionate to the aims pursued . EOS
SOS the concept of legal certainty is recognised one of the general principles of european union law by the european court of justice since the 1960s . EOS
SOS it is an important general principle of international law and public law , which predates european union law . EOS
SOS the adoption of laws which will have legal effect in the european union must have a proper legal basis . EOS
SOS the doctrine of legitimate expectation , which has its roots in the principles of legal certainty and good faith , is also a central element of the general principle of legal certainty in european union law . EOS
SOS as such the european court of justice is bound to draw inspiration from the constitutional traditions common to the member states . EOS
SOS therefore , the european court of justice can not uphold measures which are incompatible with fundamental rights recognised and protected in the constitutions of member states . EOS
SOS none of the original treaties establishing the european union mention protection for fundamental rights . EOS
SOS at the time the only concern was that member states should be prevented from violating human rights , hence the establishment of the european convention on human rights in 1950 and the establishment of the european court of human rights . EOS
SOS at the time the only concern was that member states should be prevented from violating human rights , hence the establishment of the european convention on human rights in 1950 and the establishment of the european court of human rights . EOS
SOS at the time the only concern was that member states should be prevented from violating human rights , hence the establishment of the european convention on human rights in 1950 and the establishment of the european court of human rights . EOS
SOS in 1999 the european council set up a body tasked with drafting a european charter of human rights , which could form the constitutional basis for the european union and as such tailored specifically to apply to the european union and its institutions . EOS
SOS the 2007 lisbon treaty explicitly recognised fundamental rights by providing in article 6 -lrb- 1 -rrb- that " the union recognises the rights , freedoms and principles set out in the charter of fundamental rights of the european union of 7 december 2000 , as adopted at strasbourg on 12 december 2007 , which shall have the same legal value as the treaties . " EOS
SOS therefore , the charter of fundamental rights of the european union has become an integral part of european union law , UNK the fundamental rights which were previously considered general principles of european union law . EOS
SOS in effect , after the lisbon treaty , the charter and the convention now UNK under european union law , though the former is enforced by the european court of justice in relation to european union measures , and the latter by the european court of human rights in relation to measures by member states . EOS
SOS in effect , after the lisbon treaty , the charter and the convention now UNK under european union law , though the former is enforced by the european court of justice in relation to european union measures , and the latter by the european court of human rights in relation to measures by member states . EOS
SOS the social chapter is a chapter of the 1997 treaty of amsterdam covering social policy issues in european union law . EOS
SOS the social chapter is a chapter of the 1997 treaty of amsterdam covering social policy issues in european union law . EOS
SOS the basis for the social chapter was developed in 1989 by the " social partners " representatives , namely UNK , the employers ' confederation , the european trade union confederation -lrb- UNK -rrb- and UNK , the european centre of public enterprises . EOS
SOS the social charter declares 30 general principles , including on fair remuneration of employment , health and safety at work , rights of disabled and elderly , the rights of workers , on vocational training and improvements of living conditions . EOS
SOS the social charter became the basis for european community legislation on these issues in 40 pieces of legislation . EOS
SOS the social charter was subsequently adopted in 1989 by 11 of the then 12 member states . EOS
SOS the uk refused to sign the social charter and was exempt from the legislation covering social charter issues unless it agreed to be bound by the legislation . EOS
SOS the uk subsequently was the only member state to veto the social charter being included as the " social chapter " of the 1992 maastricht treaty - instead , an agreement on social policy was added as a protocol . EOS
SOS the uk subsequently was the only member state to veto the social charter being included as the " social chapter " of the 1992 maastricht treaty - instead , an agreement on social policy was added as a protocol . EOS
SOS following the election of the uk labour party to government in 1997 , the uk formally subscribed to the agreement on social policy , which allowed it to be included with minor amendments as the social chapter of the 1997 treaty of amsterdam . EOS
SOS following the election of the uk labour party to government in 1997 , the uk formally subscribed to the agreement on social policy , which allowed it to be included with minor amendments as the social chapter of the 1997 treaty of amsterdam . EOS
SOS the uk subsequently adopted the main legislation previously agreed under the agreement on social policy , the 1994 works council directive , which required workforce consultation in businesses , and the 1996 parental leave directive . EOS
