SOS other prominent alumni include anthropologists david graeber and donald johanson , who is best known for discovering the fossil of a female hominid australopithecine known as " lucy " in the afar triangle region , psychologist john b. watson , american psychologist who established the psychological school of behaviorism , communication theorist harold innis , chess grandmaster samuel reshevsky , and conservative international relations scholar and white house coordinator of security planning for the national security council samuel p. huntington . EOS

SOS notable faculty in physics have included the speed of light calculator a. a. michelson , elementary charge calculator robert a. millikan , discoverer of the compton effect arthur h. compton , the creator of the first nuclear reactor enrico fermi , " the father of the hydrogen bomb " edward teller , " one of the most brilliant and productive experimental physicists of the twentieth century " luis walter alvarez , murray gell-mann who introduced the quark , second female nobel laureate maria goeppert-mayer , the youngest american winner of the nobel prize tsung-dao lee , and astrophysicist subrahmanyan chandrasekhar . EOS

SOS the yuan dynasty -lrb- chinese : ; pinyin : yun cho -rrb- , officially the great yuan -lrb- chinese : ; pinyin : d yun ; mongolian : yehe yuan ulus -lsb- a -rsb- -rrb- , was the empire or ruling dynasty of china established by kublai khan , leader of the mongolian borjigin clan . EOS
SOS although the mongols had ruled territories including today 's north china for decades , it was not until 1271 that kublai khan officially proclaimed the dynasty in the traditional chinese style . EOS
SOS the yuan dynasty is considered both a successor to the mongol empire and an imperial chinese dynasty . EOS
SOS in official chinese histories , the yuan dynasty bore the mandate of heaven , following the song dynasty and preceding the ming dynasty . EOS

SOS in 1271 , kublai khan imposed the name great yuan -lrb- chinese : ; pinyin : d yun ; wade -- giles : UNK -rrb- , establishing the yuan dynasty . EOS
SOS " d yun " -lrb- -rrb- is from the sentence " " -lrb- d UNK qin yun / " great is qin , the UNK " -rrb- in the commentaries on the classic of changes -lrb- i ching -rrb- section regarding qin -lrb- -rrb- . EOS
SOS the counterpart in mongolian language was dai n ulus , also rendered as ikh yuan ls or UNK yuan ulus . EOS
SOS " great mongol state " -rrb- , resulting in dai n UNK UNK ulus -lrb- mongolian script : -rrb- , meaning " great yuan great mongol state " . EOS
SOS furthermore , the yuan is sometimes known as the " empire of the great khan " or " khanate of the great khan " , which particularly appeared on some yuan maps , since yuan emperors held the nominal title of great khan . EOS

SOS kublai 's government after UNK was a compromise between preserving mongol interests in china and satisfying the demands of his chinese subjects . EOS
SOS he restored the imperial secretariat and left the local administrative structure of past chinese dynasties unchanged . EOS
SOS however , kublai rejected plans to revive the confucian imperial examinations and divided yuan society into three , later four , classes with the han chinese occupying the lowest rank . EOS
SOS he instituted the reforms proposed by his chinese advisers by centralizing the bureaucracy , expanding the circulation of paper money , and maintaining the traditional monopolies on salt and iron . EOS

SOS thus , zhenjin 's third son , with the support of his mother UNK and the minister bayan , succeeded the throne and ruled as temr khan , or emperor UNK , from 1294 to UNK . EOS

SOS he was the first yuan emperor to actively support and adopt mainstream chinese culture after the reign of kublai , to the discontent of some mongol elite . EOS

SOS gegeen was assassinated in a coup involving five princes from a rival faction , perhaps steppe elite opposed to confucian reforms . EOS

SOS one of his successful projects was to finish the UNK official histories of the liao , jin , and song dynasties , which were eventually completed in 1345 . EOS
SOS the final years of the yuan dynasty were marked by struggle , famine , and bitterness among the populace . EOS
SOS in time , kublai khan 's successors lost all influence on other mongol lands across asia , while the mongols beyond the middle kingdom saw them as too chinese . EOS
SOS outlaws ravaged the country without interference from the weakening yuan armies . EOS
SOS from the late UNK onwards , people in the countryside suffered from frequent natural disasters such as droughts , floods and the resulting famines , and the government 's lack of effective policy led to a loss of popular support . EOS
SOS in 1351 , the red turban rebellion started and grew into a nationwide uprising . EOS

SOS the political unity of china and much of central asia promoted trade between east and west . EOS
SOS the mongols ' extensive west asian and european contacts produced a fair amount of cultural exchange . EOS
SOS it had significantly eased trade and commerce across asia until its decline ; the communications between yuan dynasty and its ally and subordinate in persia , the ilkhanate , encouraged this development . EOS
SOS eastern crops such as carrots , UNK , new varieties of lemons , eggplants , and melons , high-quality UNK sugar , and cotton were all either introduced or successfully popularized during the yuan dynasty . EOS
SOS western musical instruments were introduced to enrich chinese performing arts . EOS
SOS buddhism -lrb- especially tibetan buddhism -rrb- flourished , although taoism endured certain UNK in favor of buddhism from the yuan government . EOS
SOS confucian governmental practices and examinations based on the classics , which had fallen into disuse in north china during the period of disunity , were reinstated by the yuan court , probably in the hope of maintaining order over han society . EOS
SOS advances were realized in the fields of travel literature , UNK , geography , and scientific education . EOS
SOS the most famous traveler of the period was the venetian marco polo , whose account of his trip to " UNK , " the capital of the great khan , and of life there astounded the people of europe . EOS
SOS the account of his travels , il UNK -lrb- or , the million , known in english as the travels of marco polo -rrb- , appeared about the year 1299 . EOS

SOS among kublai khan 's top engineers and scientists was the astronomer guo shoujing , who was tasked with many public works projects and helped the yuan reform the lunisolar calendar to provide an accuracy of 365.2425 days of the year , which was only 26 seconds off the modern gregorian calendar 's measurement . SOS contacts with the west also brought the introduction to china of a major food crop , sorghum , along with other foreign food products and methods of preparation . EOS

SOS the system of bureaucracy created by kublai khan reflected various cultures in the empire , including that of the han chinese , khitans , jurchens , mongols , and tibetan buddhists . EOS
SOS the chinese-style elements of the bureaucracy mainly came from the native tang , song , as well as khitan liao and jurchen jin dynasties . EOS
SOS chinese advisers such as liu UNK and yao shu gave strong influence to kublai 's early court , and the central government administration was established within the first decade of kublai 's reign . EOS
SOS this government adopted the traditional chinese tripartite division of authority among civil , military , and censorial offices , including the central secretariat -lrb- zhongshu sheng -rrb- to manage civil affairs , the privy council -lrb- chinese : -rrb- to manage military affairs , and the censorate to conduct internal surveillance and inspection . SOS in the china of the yuan , or mongol era , various important developments in the arts occurred or continued in their development , including the areas of painting , mathematics , calligraphy , poetry , and theater , with many great artists and writers being famous today . EOS
SOS due to the coming together of painting , poetry , and calligraphy at this time many of the artists practicing these different pursuits were the same individuals , though perhaps more famed for one area of their achievements than others . EOS
SOS often in terms of the further development of landscape painting as well as the classical joining together of the arts of painting , poetry , and calligraphy , the song dynasty and the yuan dynasty are linked together . EOS
SOS in yuan poetry , the main development was the qu , which was used among other poetic forms by most of the famous yuan poets . EOS
SOS one of the key factors in the mix of the UNK variety show was the incorporation of poetry both classical and of the newer qu form . EOS
SOS however , unlike the western khanates , the yuan dynasty never converted to islam . EOS
SOS instead , kublai khan , the founder of the yuan dynasty , favored buddhism , especially the tibetan variants . EOS
SOS as a result , tibetan buddhism was established as the de facto state religion . EOS
SOS the top-level department and government agency known as the bureau of buddhist and tibetan affairs -lrb- xuanzheng yuan -rrb- was set up in khanbaliq -lrb- modern beijing -rrb- to supervise buddhist monks throughout the empire . EOS
SOS since kublai khan only esteemed the sakya sect of tibetan buddhism , other religions became less important . EOS

SOS kenya -lrb- / knj / ; locally -lsb- ka -rsb- -lrb- listen -rrb- -rrb- , officially the republic of kenya , is a country in africa and a founding member of the east african community -lrb- UNK -rrb- . EOS
SOS it is bordered by tanzania to the south , uganda to the west , south sudan to the north-west , ethiopia to the north and somalia to the north-east . EOS
SOS kenya covers UNK km2 -lrb- UNK sq mi -rrb- , and had a population of approximately 45 million people in july 2014 . EOS
SOS kenya has a warm and humid tropical climate on its indian ocean coastline . EOS
SOS the climate is cooler in the savannah grasslands around the capital city , nairobi , and especially closer to mount kenya , which has snow permanently on its peaks . EOS

SOS by the first millennium ad , the bantu expansion had reached the area from west-central africa . EOS
SOS bantu and UNK populations together constitute around 97 % of the nation 's residents . EOS
SOS european and arab presence in coastal mombasa dates to the early modern period ; european exploration of the interior began in the 19th century . EOS
SOS kenya obtained independence in december 1963 . EOS
SOS the republic of kenya is named after mount kenya . EOS

SOS kenya 's first system of education was introduced by british colonists . EOS
SOS after kenya 's independence on 12 december 1963 , an authority named the UNK commission was formed to introduce changes that would reflect the nation 's sovereignty . EOS
SOS after kenya 's independence on 12 december 1963 , an authority named the UNK commission was formed to introduce changes that would reflect the nation 's sovereignty . EOS
SOS the commission focused on identity and unity , which were critical issues at the time . EOS
SOS between 1964 and 1985 , the 7 -- 4 -- 2 -- 3 system was adopted -- seven years of primary , four years of lower secondary , two years of upper secondary , and three years of university . EOS
SOS in 1981 , the presidential working party on the second university was commissioned to look at both the possibilities of setting up a second university in kenya as well as the reforming of the entire education system . EOS
SOS the committee recommended that the 7 -- 4 -- 2 -- 3 system be changed to an 8 -- 4 -- 4 system -lrb- eight years in primary , four years in secondary , and four years in university education -rrb- . EOS
SOS the table under present-day education in kenya below shows the structure of the 8 -- 4 -- 4 system . EOS
SOS although the 7 -- 4 -- 2 -- 3 system theoretically ended with the introduction of the new 8 -- 4 -- 4 system in 1985 , the last batch of students from the former system graduated from kenyan universities in 1992 . EOS
SOS the current 8 -- 4 -- 4 system was launched in january 1985 . EOS
SOS it put more emphasis on vocational subjects on the assumption that the new structure would enable school drop-outs at all levels either to be UNK or to secure employment in the informal sector . EOS
SOS it put more emphasis on vocational subjects on the assumption that the new structure would enable school drop-outs at all levels either to be UNK or to secure employment in the informal sector . EOS
SOS in january 2003 , the government of kenya announced the introduction of free primary education . EOS
SOS basic formal education starts at age six years and lasts 12 years comprising eight years in primary school and four years in high school or secondary school . EOS
SOS basic formal education starts at age six years and lasts 12 years comprising eight years in primary school and four years in high school or secondary school . EOS
SOS primary school is free in public schools and those who exit at this level can join a vocational UNK polytechnic or make their own arrangements for an apprenticeship program and learn a trade such as UNK , carpentry , motor vehicle repair , UNK and masonry for about two years . EOS
SOS those who complete high school can join a polytechnic or other technical college and study for three years or proceed directly to the university and study for four years . EOS
SOS the country 's literacy level stands at 85 % of the whole population . EOS
SOS preschool , which targets children from age three to five , is an integral component of the education system and is a key requirement for admission to standard one -lrb- first grade -rrb- . EOS

SOS for those who proceed to secondary level , there is a national examination at the end of form four -- the kenya certificate of secondary education -lrb- UNK -rrb- , which determines those proceeding to the universities , other professional training or employment . EOS

SOS the intergovernmental panel on climate change -lrb- ipcc -rrb- is a scientific intergovernmental body under the auspices of the united nations , set up at the request of member governments . EOS
SOS it was first established in 1988 by two united nations organizations , the world meteorological organization -lrb- wmo -rrb- and the united nations environment programme -lrb- unep -rrb- , and later endorsed by the united nations general assembly through resolution UNK . EOS
SOS the ultimate objective of the unfccc is to " stabilize greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere at a level that would prevent dangerous UNK -lsb- i.e . , UNK -rsb- interference with the climate system " . EOS
SOS the ipcc produces reports that support the united nations framework convention on climate change -lrb- unfccc -rrb- , which is the main international treaty on climate change . EOS
SOS it was first established in 1988 by two united nations organizations , the world meteorological organization -lrb- wmo -rrb- and the united nations environment programme -lrb- unep -rrb- , and later endorsed by the united nations general assembly through resolution UNK . EOS

SOS the ipcc does not carry out research nor does it monitor climate related data . EOS
SOS lead authors of ipcc reports assess the available information about climate change based on published sources . EOS
SOS authors may refer to UNK sources -lrb- the " grey literature " -rrb- , provided that they are of sufficient quality . EOS
SOS examples of UNK sources include model results , reports from government agencies and non-governmental organizations , and industry journals . EOS

SOS the executive summary of the UNK i summary for policymakers report says they are certain that emissions resulting from human activities are substantially increasing the atmospheric concentrations of the greenhouse gases , resulting on average in an additional warming of the earth 's surface . EOS
SOS the executive summary of the UNK i summary for policymakers report says they are certain that emissions resulting from human activities are substantially increasing the atmospheric concentrations of the greenhouse gases , resulting on average in an additional warming of the earth 's surface . EOS
SOS they calculate with confidence that co2 has been responsible for over half the enhanced greenhouse effect . EOS
SOS they predict that under a " business as usual " -lrb- UNK -rrb- scenario , global mean temperature will increase by about 0.3 c per decade during the -lsb- 21st -rsb- century . EOS
SOS they judge that global mean surface air temperature has increased by 0.3 to 0.6 c over the last 100 years , broadly consistent with prediction of climate models , but also of the same magnitude as natural climate variability . EOS

SOS chloroplasts ' main role is to conduct photosynthesis , where the photosynthetic pigment chlorophyll captures the energy from sunlight and converts it and stores it in the energy-storage molecules atp and nadph while freeing oxygen from water . EOS
SOS chloroplasts ' main role is to conduct photosynthesis , where the photosynthetic pigment chlorophyll captures the energy from sunlight and converts it and stores it in the energy-storage molecules atp and nadph while freeing oxygen from water . EOS
SOS chloroplasts ' main role is to conduct photosynthesis , where the photosynthetic pigment chlorophyll captures the energy from sunlight and converts it and stores it in the energy-storage molecules atp and nadph while freeing oxygen from water . EOS
SOS they then use the atp and nadph to make organic molecules from carbon dioxide in a process known as the calvin cycle . EOS
SOS the number of chloroplasts per cell varies from 1 in algae up to 100 in plants like arabidopsis and wheat . EOS
SOS chloroplasts are highly dynamic -- they circulate and are moved around within plant cells , and occasionally pinch in two to reproduce . EOS
SOS their behavior is strongly influenced by environmental factors like light color and intensity . EOS
SOS chloroplasts , like mitochondria , contain their own dna , which is thought to be inherited from their ancestor -- a photosynthetic cyanobacterium that was engulfed by an early eukaryotic cell . EOS
SOS chloroplasts , like mitochondria , contain their own dna , which is thought to be inherited from their ancestor -- a photosynthetic cyanobacterium that was engulfed by an early eukaryotic cell . EOS
SOS chloroplasts can not be made by the plant cell and must be inherited by each daughter cell during cell division . EOS
SOS chloroplasts are only found in plants and algae . EOS
SOS this origin of chloroplasts was first suggested by the russian biologist konstantin mereschkowski in 1905 after andreas schimper observed in 1883 that chloroplasts closely resemble cyanobacteria . EOS

SOS cyanobacteria are considered the ancestors of chloroplasts . EOS
SOS they are a diverse phylum of bacteria capable of carrying out photosynthesis , and are gram-negative , meaning that they have two cell membranes . EOS
SOS cyanobacteria also contain a peptidoglycan cell wall , which is thicker than in other gram-negative bacteria , and which is located between their two cell membranes . EOS
SOS they are sometimes called blue-green algae even though they are prokaryotes . EOS
SOS somewhere around a billion years ago , a UNK cyanobacterium entered an early eukaryotic cell , either as food or as an internal parasite , but managed to escape the phagocytic vacuole it was contained in . EOS
SOS somewhere around a billion years ago , a UNK cyanobacterium entered an early eukaryotic cell , either as food or as an internal parasite , but managed to escape the phagocytic vacuole it was contained in . EOS
SOS the two innermost UNK membranes that surround all chloroplasts correspond to the outer and inner membranes of the ancestral cyanobacterium 's gram negative cell wall , and not the phagosomal membrane from the host , which was probably lost . EOS
SOS the two innermost UNK membranes that surround all chloroplasts correspond to the outer and inner membranes of the ancestral cyanobacterium 's gram negative cell wall , and not the phagosomal membrane from the host , which was probably lost . EOS
SOS over time , the cyanobacterium was assimilated , and many of its genes were lost or transferred to the nucleus of the host . EOS
SOS these chloroplasts , which can be traced back directly to a cyanobacterial ancestor , are known as primary plastids -lrb- " plastid " in this context means almost the same thing as chloroplast -rrb- . EOS
SOS all primary chloroplasts belong to one of three chloroplast lineages -- the glaucophyte chloroplast lineage , the rhodophyte , or red algal chloroplast lineage , or the chloroplastidan , or green chloroplast lineage . EOS

SOS the second two are the largest , and the green chloroplast lineage is the one that contains the land plants . EOS

SOS for this reason , glaucophyte chloroplasts are also known as UNK . EOS

SOS rhodoplasts have chlorophyll a and phycobilins for photosynthetic pigments ; the phycobilin phycoerytherin is responsible for giving many red algae their distinctive red color . EOS
SOS rhodoplasts have a double membrane with an intermembrane space and phycobilin pigments organized into phycobilisomes on the thylakoid membranes , preventing their thylakoids from stacking . EOS
SOS rhodoplasts have chlorophyll a and phycobilins for photosynthetic pigments ; the phycobilin phycoerytherin is responsible for giving many red algae their distinctive red color . EOS
SOS the red phycoerytherin pigment is an adaptation to help red algae catch more sunlight in deep water -- as such , some red algae that live in shallow water have less phycoerytherin in their rhodoplasts , and can appear more greenish . EOS
SOS rhodoplasts synthesize a form of starch called UNK , which collects into granules outside the UNK , in the cytoplasm of the red alga . EOS
SOS they differ from glaucophyte and red algal chloroplasts in that they have lost their phycobilisomes , and contain chlorophyll b instead . EOS
SOS most green chloroplasts are -lrb- obviously -rrb- green , though some are n't , like some forms of UNK UNK , due to accessory pigments that override the UNK ' green colors . EOS

SOS chloroplasts have their own dna , often abbreviated as UNK , or cpdna . EOS
SOS its existence was first proved in 1962 , and first sequenced in 1986 -- when two japanese research teams sequenced the chloroplast dna of UNK and tobacco . EOS

SOS similar inverted repeats exist in the genomes of cyanobacteria and the other two chloroplast lineages -lrb- UNK and UNK -rrb- , suggesting that they predate the chloroplast , though some chloroplast UNK have since lost or flipped the inverted repeats -lrb- making them direct repeats -rrb- . EOS
SOS it is possible that the inverted repeats help stabilize the rest of the chloroplast genome , as chloroplast UNK which have lost some of the inverted repeat segments tend to get rearranged more . EOS
SOS scientists have attempted to observe chloroplast replication via electron microscopy since the 1970s . EOS
SOS the mechanism for chloroplast dna -lrb- cpdna -rrb- replication has not been UNK determined , but two main models have been proposed . EOS
SOS as the d-loop moves through the circular dna , it adopts a theta intermediary form , also known as a cairns replication intermediate , and completes replication with a rolling circle mechanism . EOS
SOS as the d-loop moves through the circular dna , it adopts a theta intermediary form , also known as a cairns replication intermediate , and completes replication with a rolling circle mechanism . EOS
SOS as the d-loop moves through the circular dna , it adopts a theta intermediary form , also known as a cairns replication intermediate , and completes replication with a rolling circle mechanism . EOS
SOS in cpdna , there are several a g deamination gradients . EOS
SOS dna becomes susceptible to deamination events when it is single stranded . EOS
SOS this mechanism is still the leading theory today ; however , a second theory suggests that most cpdna is actually linear and replicates through homologous recombination . EOS
SOS this mechanism is still the leading theory today ; however , a second theory suggests that most cpdna is actually linear and replicates through homologous recombination . EOS
SOS it further contends that only a minority of the genetic material is kept in circular chromosomes while the rest is in branched , linear , or other complex structures . EOS
SOS one of competing model for cpdna replication asserts that most cpdna is linear and participates in homologous recombination and replication structures similar to bacteriophage t4 . EOS
SOS it has been established that some plants have linear cpdna , such as maize , and that more species still contain complex structures that scientists do not yet understand . EOS
SOS because of the failure to explain the deamination gradient as well as the numerous plant species that have been shown to have circular cpdna , the predominant theory continues to hold that most cpdna is circular and most likely replicates via a d loop mechanism . EOS
SOS because of the failure to explain the deamination gradient as well as the numerous plant species that have been shown to have circular cpdna , the predominant theory continues to hold that most cpdna is circular and most likely replicates via a d loop mechanism . EOS
SOS endosymbiotic gene transfer is how we know about the lost chloroplasts in many UNK lineages . EOS
SOS even if a chloroplast is eventually lost , the genes it donated to the former host 's nucleus persist , providing evidence for the lost chloroplast 's existence . EOS
SOS for example , while diatoms -lrb- a heterokontophyte -rrb- now have a red algal derived chloroplast , the presence of many green algal genes in the diatom nucleus provide evidence that the diatom ancestor -lrb- probably the ancestor of all chromalveolates too -rrb- had a green algal derived chloroplast at some point , which was subsequently replaced by the red chloroplast . SOS a few chloroplast genes found new homes in the mitochondrial genome -- most became nonfunctional pseudogenes , though a few trna genes still work in the UNK . EOS
SOS curiously , around half of the protein products of transferred genes are n't even targeted back to the chloroplast . EOS
SOS many became UNK , taking on new functions like participating in cell division , protein routing , and even disease resistance . EOS

SOS to fix carbon dioxide into sugar molecules in the process of photosynthesis , chloroplasts use an enzyme called rubisco . EOS
SOS rubisco has a problem -- it has trouble distinguishing between carbon dioxide and oxygen , so at high oxygen concentrations , rubisco starts accidentally adding oxygen to sugar precursors . EOS
SOS rubisco has a problem -- it has trouble distinguishing between carbon dioxide and oxygen , so at high oxygen concentrations , rubisco starts accidentally adding oxygen to sugar precursors . EOS
SOS this is a big problem , since o2 is produced by the initial light reactions of photosynthesis , causing issues down the line in the calvin cycle which uses rubisco . EOS
SOS this has the end result of atp energy being wasted and co2 being released , all with no sugar being produced . EOS

SOS a prime number -lrb- or a prime -rrb- is a natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself . EOS
SOS a natural number greater than 1 that is not a prime number is called a composite number . EOS
SOS the fundamental theorem of arithmetic establishes the central role of primes in number theory : any integer greater than 1 can be expressed as a product of primes that is unique up to ordering . EOS
SOS the fundamental theorem of arithmetic establishes the central role of primes in number theory : any integer greater than 1 can be expressed as a product of primes that is unique up to ordering . EOS
SOS the uniqueness in this theorem requires excluding 1 as a prime because one can include arbitrarily many instances of 1 in any factorization , e.g . , 3 , 1 3 , 1 1 3 , etc . are all valid UNK of 3 . EOS
SOS the property of being prime -lrb- or not -rrb- is called primality . EOS
SOS a simple but slow method of UNK the primality of a given number n is known as trial division . EOS
SOS these include the miller -- rabin primality test , which is fast but has a small probability of error , and the UNK primality test , which always produces the correct answer in polynomial time but is too slow to be practical . EOS
SOS these include the miller -- rabin primality test , which is fast but has a small probability of error , and the UNK primality test , which always produces the correct answer in polynomial time but is too slow to be practical . EOS
SOS as of january 2016 -lsb- update -rsb- , the largest known prime number has UNK decimal digits . EOS
SOS there are infinitely many primes , as demonstrated by euclid around 300 bc . EOS
SOS however , the distribution of primes , that is to say , the statistical behaviour of primes in the large , can be modelled . EOS
SOS the first result in that direction is the prime number theorem , proven at the end of the 19th century , which says that the probability that a given , randomly chosen number n is prime is inversely proportional to its number of digits , or to the logarithm of n . EOS
SOS the first result in that direction is the prime number theorem , proven at the end of the 19th century , which says that the probability that a given , randomly chosen number n is prime is inversely proportional to its number of digits , or to the logarithm of n . EOS
SOS many questions regarding prime numbers remain open , such as goldbach 's conjecture -lrb- that every even integer greater than 2 can be expressed as the sum of two primes -rrb- , and the twin prime conjecture -lrb- that there are infinitely many pairs of primes whose difference is 2 -rrb- . EOS
SOS many questions regarding prime numbers remain open , such as goldbach 's conjecture -lrb- that every even integer greater than 2 can be expressed as the sum of two primes -rrb- , and the twin prime conjecture -lrb- that there are infinitely many pairs of primes whose difference is 2 -rrb- . EOS
SOS such questions spurred the development of various branches of number theory , focusing on analytic or algebraic aspects of numbers . EOS
SOS primes are used in several routines in information technology , such as public-key cryptography , which makes use of properties such as the difficulty of factoring large numbers into their prime factors . EOS
SOS prime numbers give rise to various generalizations in other mathematical domains , mainly algebra , such as prime elements and prime ideals . EOS
SOS no even number greater than 2 is prime because by definition , any such number n has at least three distinct divisors , namely 1 , 2 , and n . EOS
SOS no even number greater than 2 is prime because by definition , any such number n has at least three distinct divisors , namely 1 , 2 , and n . EOS
SOS accordingly , the term odd prime refers to any prime number greater than 2 . EOS
SOS similarly , when written in the usual decimal system , all prime numbers larger than 5 end in 1 , 3 , 7 , or 9 , since even numbers are multiples of 2 and numbers ending in 0 or 5 are multiples of 5 . EOS
SOS similarly , when written in the usual decimal system , all prime numbers larger than 5 end in 1 , 3 , 7 , or 9 , since even numbers are multiples of 2 and numbers ending in 0 or 5 are multiples of 5 . EOS
SOS most early greeks did not even consider 1 to be a number , so they could not consider it to be a prime . EOS
SOS in the mid-18th century christian goldbach listed 1 as the first prime in his famous correspondence with leonhard euler -- who did not agree . EOS
SOS in the mid-18th century christian goldbach listed 1 as the first prime in his famous correspondence with leonhard euler -- who did not agree . EOS
SOS for example , derrick norman UNK 's list of primes up to UNK , reprinted as late as 1956 , started with 1 as its first prime . EOS
SOS by the early 20th century , mathematicians began to accept that 1 is not a prime number , but rather forms its own special category as a " unit " . EOS
SOS a large body of mathematical work would still be valid when calling 1 a prime , but euclid 's fundamental theorem of arithmetic -lrb- mentioned above -rrb- would not hold as stated . EOS
SOS similarly , the sieve of eratosthenes would not work correctly if 1 were considered a prime : a modified version of the sieve that considers 1 as prime would eliminate all multiples of 1 -lrb- that is , all other numbers -rrb- and produce as output only the single number 1 . EOS
SOS furthermore , the prime numbers have several properties that the number 1 lacks , such as the relationship of the number to its corresponding value of euler 's UNK function or the sum of divisors function . EOS
SOS furthermore , the prime numbers have several properties that the number 1 lacks , such as the relationship of the number to its corresponding value of euler 's UNK function or the sum of divisors function . EOS
SOS similarly , the sieve of eratosthenes would not work correctly if 1 were considered a prime : a modified version of the sieve that considers 1 as prime would eliminate all multiples of 1 -lrb- that is , all other numbers -rrb- and produce as output only the single number 1 . EOS
SOS there are hints in the surviving records of the ancient egyptians that they had some knowledge of prime numbers : the egyptian fraction expansions in the UNK papyrus , for instance , have quite different forms for primes and for composites . EOS
SOS however , the earliest surviving records of the explicit study of prime numbers come from the ancient greeks . EOS
SOS euclid 's elements -lrb- circa 300 bc -rrb- contain important theorems about primes , including the infinitude of primes and the fundamental theorem of arithmetic . EOS
SOS euclid also showed how to construct a perfect number from a mersenne prime . EOS
SOS the sieve of eratosthenes , attributed to eratosthenes , is a simple method to compute primes , although the large primes found today with computers are not generated this way . EOS

SOS the french monk marin mersenne looked at primes of the form 2p 1 , with p a prime . EOS
SOS fermat also conjectured that all numbers of the form UNK + 1 are prime -lrb- they are called fermat numbers -rrb- and he verified this up to n = 4 -lrb- or 216 + 1 -rrb- . EOS
SOS the most basic method of checking the primality of a given integer n is called trial division . EOS
SOS this routine can be implemented more efficiently if a complete list of primes up to is known -- then trial divisions need to be checked only for those m that are prime . EOS
SOS this routine consists of dividing n by each integer m that is greater than 1 and less than or equal to the square root of n . EOS
SOS for example , to check the primality of 37 , only three divisions are necessary -lrb- m = 2 , 3 , and 5 -rrb- , given that 4 and 6 are composite . EOS
SOS this routine consists of dividing n by each integer m that is greater than 1 and less than or equal to the square root of n . EOS
SOS modern primality tests for general numbers n can be divided into two main classes , probabilistic -lrb- or " monte carlo " -rrb- and deterministic algorithms . EOS
SOS modern primality tests for general numbers n can be divided into two main classes , probabilistic -lrb- or " monte carlo " -rrb- and deterministic algorithms . EOS
SOS modern primality tests for general numbers n can be divided into two main classes , probabilistic -lrb- or " monte carlo " -rrb- and deterministic algorithms . EOS
SOS for example , trial division is a deterministic algorithm because , if performed correctly , it will always identify a prime number as prime and a composite number as composite . EOS
SOS if we repeat the test n times and pass every time , then the probability that our number is composite is 1 / -lrb- UNK -rrb- n , which decreases exponentially with the number of tests , so we can be as sure as we like -lrb- though never perfectly sure -rrb- that the number is prime . EOS
SOS a particularly simple example of a probabilistic test is the fermat primality test , which relies on the fact -lrb- fermat 's little theorem -rrb- that np n -lrb- mod p -rrb- for any n if p is a prime number . EOS
SOS a particularly simple example of a probabilistic test is the fermat primality test , which relies on the fact -lrb- fermat 's little theorem -rrb- that np n -lrb- mod p -rrb- for any n if p is a prime number . EOS
SOS a UNK with this test is that there are some composite numbers -lrb- the UNK numbers -rrb- that satisfy the fermat identity even though they are not prime , so the test has no way of distinguishing between prime numbers and UNK numbers . EOS
SOS more powerful extensions of the fermat primality test , such as the UNK , UNK , and solovay-strassen tests , are guaranteed to fail at least some of the time when applied to a composite number . EOS

SOS can have infinitely many primes only when a and q are UNK , i.e . , their greatest common divisor is one . EOS
SOS if this necessary condition is satisfied , UNK 's theorem on arithmetic progressions asserts that the progression contains infinitely many primes . EOS
SOS what is more , the primes are distributed equally among those rows in the long run -- the density of all primes congruent a modulo 9 is 1/6 . EOS
SOS the rows -lrb- = progressions -rrb- starting with a = 3 , 6 , or 9 contain at most one prime number . EOS
SOS in all other rows -lrb- a = 1 , 2 , 4 , 5 , 7 , and 8 -rrb- there are infinitely many prime numbers . EOS
SOS the zeta function is closely related to prime numbers . EOS
SOS for example , the aforementioned fact that there are infinitely many primes can also be seen using the zeta function : if there were only UNK many primes then -lrb- 1 -rrb- would have a finite value . EOS

SOS one of them is goldbach 's conjecture , which asserts that every even integer n greater than 2 can be written as a sum of two primes . EOS
SOS often having an elementary formulation , many of these conjectures have withstood a proof for decades : all four of landau 's problems from 1912 are still unsolved . EOS
SOS as of february 2011 -lsb- update -rsb- , this conjecture has been verified for all numbers up to n = 2 1017 . EOS
SOS weaker statements than this have been proven , for example UNK 's theorem says that every sufficiently large odd integer can be written as a sum of three primes . EOS
SOS chen 's theorem says that every sufficiently large even number can be expressed as the sum of a prime and a UNK , the product of two primes . EOS

SOS UNK 's conjecture is a strengthening of that conjecture , it states that for every positive integer n , there are infinitely many pairs of consecutive primes that differ by 2n . EOS

SOS these conjectures are special cases of the broad UNK 's hypothesis h. UNK 's conjecture says that there are always at least four primes between the squares of consecutive primes greater than 2 . EOS
SOS for a long time , number theory in general , and the study of prime numbers in particular , was seen as the canonical example of pure mathematics , with no applications outside of the self-interest of studying the topic with the exception of use of prime numbered gear teeth to distribute wear evenly . EOS
SOS in particular , number theorists such as british mathematician g. h. hardy UNK themselves on doing work that had absolutely no military significance . EOS
SOS however , this vision was shattered in the 1970s , when it was publicly announced that prime numbers could be used as the basis for the creation of public key cryptography algorithms . EOS

SOS generally , " prime " indicates UNK or UNK , in an appropriate sense . EOS
SOS for example , the prime field is the smallest subfield of a field f containing both 0 and 1 . EOS
SOS any knot can be uniquely expressed as a connected sum of prime knots . EOS
SOS often a second , additional meaning is intended by using the word prime , namely that any object can be , essentially uniquely , decomposed into its prime components . EOS
SOS for example , in knot theory , a prime knot is a knot that is UNK in the sense that it can not be written as the knot sum of two nontrivial knots . EOS
SOS prime numbers give rise to two more general concepts that apply to elements of any commutative ring r , an algebraic structure where addition , subtraction and multiplication are defined : prime elements and irreducible elements . EOS
SOS prime numbers give rise to two more general concepts that apply to elements of any commutative ring r , an algebraic structure where addition , subtraction and multiplication are defined : prime elements and irreducible elements . EOS
SOS prime numbers give rise to two more general concepts that apply to elements of any commutative ring r , an algebraic structure where addition , subtraction and multiplication are defined : prime elements and irreducible elements . EOS
SOS an element p of r is called prime element if it is neither zero nor a unit -lrb- i.e . , does not have a multiplicative inverse -rrb- and satisfies the following requirement : given x and y in r such that p divides the product xy , then p divides x or y . EOS
SOS an element is irreducible if it is not a unit and can not be written as a product of two ring elements that are not units . EOS

SOS in ring theory , the notion of number is generally replaced with that of ideal . EOS

SOS the rhine -lrb- romansh : rein , german : rhein , french : le rhin , dutch : rijn -rrb- is a european river that begins in the swiss canton of graubnden in the southeastern swiss alps , forms part of the swiss-austrian , swiss-liechtenstein border , swiss-german and then the franco-german border , then flows through the rhineland and eventually empties into the north sea in the netherlands . SOS the rhine was not known to herodotus and first enters the historical period in the 1st century bc in roman-era geography . EOS
SOS at that time , it formed the boundary between gaul and germania . EOS
SOS the upper rhine had been part of the areal of the late hallstatt culture since the 6th century bc , and by the 1st century bc , the areal of the la tne culture covered almost its entire length , forming a contact zone with the UNK culture , i.e . the locus of early UNK cultural contact . EOS

SOS the northern section of this frontier , where the rhine is deep and broad , remained the roman boundary until the empire fell . EOS
SOS the romans kept eight legions in five bases along the rhine . EOS
SOS between about ad 14 and 180 , the assignment of legions was as follows : for the army of germania inferior , two legions at vetera -lrb- xanten -rrb- , i germanica and xx valeria -lrb- pannonian troops -rrb- ; two legions at oppidum ubiorum -lrb- " town of the ubii " -rrb- , which was renamed to colonia agrippina , descending to cologne , v alaudae , a celtic legion recruited from gallia narbonensis and xxi , possibly a galatian legion from the other side of the empire . SOS since the peace of westphalia , the upper rhine formed a contentious border between france and germany . EOS
SOS establishing " natural borders " on the rhine was a long-term goal of french foreign policy , since the middle ages , though the language border was -- and is -- far more to the west . EOS
SOS the confederation of the rhine was established by napoleon , as a french client state , in 1806 and lasted until 1814 , during which time it served as a significant source of resources and military manpower for the first french empire . EOS

SOS at the end of world war i , the rhineland was subject to the treaty of versailles . EOS
SOS this decreed that it would be occupied by the allies , until 1935 and after that , it would be a UNK zone , with the german army forbidden to enter . EOS

SOS the allies left the rhineland , in 1930 and the german army re-occupied it in 1936 , which was enormously popular in germany . EOS

SOS following a referendum in 1997 , in which the scottish electorate voted for devolution , the current parliament was convened by the scotland act 1998 , which sets out its powers as a devolved legislature . EOS
SOS the act delineates the legislative competence of the parliament -- the areas in which it can make laws -- by explicitly specifying powers that are " reserved " to the parliament of the united kingdom . EOS

SOS the scottish parliament has the power to legislate in all areas that are not explicitly reserved to westminster . EOS
SOS for the next three hundred years , scotland was directly governed by the parliament of great britain and the subsequent parliament of the united kingdom , both seated at westminster , and the lack of a parliament of scotland remained an important element in scottish national identity . EOS

SOS suggestions for a ` devolved ' parliament were made before 1914 , but were UNK due to the outbreak of the first world war . EOS
SOS a sharp rise in nationalism in scotland during the late 1960s fuelled demands for some form of home rule or complete independence , and in 1969 prompted the incumbent labour government of harold wilson to set up the UNK commission to consider the british constitution . EOS
SOS UNK published his report in 1973 recommending the establishment of a directly elected scottish assembly to legislate for the majority of domestic scottish affairs . EOS
SOS during this time , the discovery of oil in the north sea and the following " it 's scotland 's oil " campaign of the scottish national party -lrb- snp -rrb- resulted in rising support for scottish independence , as well as the snp . EOS
SOS during this time , the discovery of oil in the north sea and the following " it 's scotland 's oil " campaign of the scottish national party -lrb- snp -rrb- resulted in rising support for scottish independence , as well as the snp . EOS
SOS the combined effect of these events led to prime minister wilson committing his government to some form of devolved legislature in 1974 . EOS
SOS the party argued that the revenues from the oil were not UNK scotland as much as they should . EOS
SOS however , it was not until 1978 that final legislative proposals for a scottish assembly were passed by the united kingdom parliament . EOS
SOS under the terms of the scotland act 1978 , an elected assembly would be set up in edinburgh provided that the majority of the scottish electorate voted for it in a referendum to be held on 1 march 1979 that represented at least 40 % of the total electorate . EOS
SOS under the terms of the scotland act 1978 , an elected assembly would be set up in edinburgh provided that the majority of the scottish electorate voted for it in a referendum to be held on 1 march 1979 that represented at least 40 % of the total electorate . EOS
SOS although the vote was 51.6 % in favour of a scottish assembly , this figure did not equal the 40 % of the total electorate threshold deemed necessary to pass the measure , as 32.9 % of the eligible voting population did not , or had been unable to , vote . EOS
SOS the 1979 scottish devolution referendum to establish a devolved scottish assembly failed . EOS
SOS although the vote was 51.6 % in favour of a scottish assembly , this figure did not equal the 40 % of the total electorate threshold deemed necessary to pass the measure , as 32.9 % of the eligible voting population did not , or had been unable to , vote . EOS
SOS throughout the 1980s and 1990s , demand for a scottish parliament grew , in part because the government of the united kingdom was controlled by the conservative party , while scotland itself elected relatively few conservative mps . EOS

EOS
SOS publishing its blueprint for devolution in 1995 , the convention provided much of the basis for the structure of the parliament . EOS
SOS since september 2004 , the official home of the scottish parliament has been a new scottish parliament building , in the holyrood area of edinburgh . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament building was designed by spanish architect UNK UNK in partnership with local edinburgh architecture firm UNK which was led by design principal tony kettle . EOS

SOS some of the principal features of the complex include UNK buildings , a UNK branch merging into adjacent parkland and UNK walls formed from the stones of previous buildings . EOS

SOS this building was vacated twice to allow for the meeting of the church 's general assembly . EOS
SOS whilst the permanent building at holyrood was being constructed , the parliament 's temporary home was the general assembly hall of the church of scotland on the royal mile in edinburgh . EOS
SOS official photographs and television interviews were held in the courtyard adjoining the assembly hall , which is part of the school of divinity of the university of edinburgh . EOS

SOS after each election to the scottish parliament , at the beginning of each parliamentary session , parliament elects one msp to serve as presiding officer , the equivalent of the speaker -lrb- currently UNK UNK -rrb- , and two msps to serve as deputies -lrb- currently elaine smith and john scott -rrb- . EOS
SOS the presiding officer and deputies are elected by a secret ballot of the 129 msps , which is the only secret ballot conducted in the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS the presiding officer and deputies are elected by a secret ballot of the 129 msps , which is the only secret ballot conducted in the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS a vote clerk sits in front of the presiding officer and operates the electronic voting equipment and chamber clocks . EOS
SOS as a member of the scottish parliamentary corporate body , the presiding officer is responsible for ensuring that the parliament functions effectively and has the staff , property and resources it requires to operate . EOS
SOS convening the parliamentary bureau , which UNK time and sets the work agenda in the chamber , is another of the roles of the presiding officer . EOS
SOS under the standing orders of the parliament the bureau consists of the presiding officer and one representative from each political parties with five or more seats in the parliament . EOS
SOS the presiding officer also represents the scottish parliament at home and abroad in an official capacity . EOS
SOS the debating chamber of the scottish parliament has seating arranged in a hemicycle , which reflects the desire to encourage consensus amongst elected members . EOS
SOS the debating chamber of the scottish parliament has seating arranged in a hemicycle , which reflects the desire to encourage consensus amongst elected members . EOS
SOS there are 131 seats in the debating chamber . EOS
SOS of the total 131 seats , 129 are occupied by the parliament 's elected msps and 2 are seats for the scottish law officers -- the lord advocate and the solicitor general for scotland , who are not elected members of the parliament but are members of the scottish government . EOS
SOS in front of the presiding officers ' desk is the parliamentary mace , which is made from silver and inlaid with gold panned from scottish rivers and inscribed with the words : wisdom , compassion , justice and integrity . EOS

SOS presented to the scottish parliament by the queen upon its official opening in july 1999 , the mace is displayed in a glass case suspended from the lid . EOS

SOS parliament typically sits UNK , wednesdays and thursdays from early january to late june and from early september to mid december , with two-week UNK in april and october . EOS
SOS plenary meetings in the debating chamber usually take place on wednesday afternoons from 2 pm to 6 pm and on thursdays from UNK am to 6 pm . EOS
SOS chamber debates and committee meetings are open to the public . EOS
SOS entry is free , but booking in advance is recommended due to limited space . EOS
SOS proceedings are also recorded in text form , in print and online , in the official report , which is the substantially verbatim UNK of parliamentary debates . EOS
SOS the first item of business on wednesdays is usually time for reflection , at which a speaker addresses members for up to four minutes , sharing a perspective on issues of faith . EOS
SOS the first item of business on wednesdays is usually time for reflection , at which a speaker addresses members for up to four minutes , sharing a perspective on issues of faith . EOS
SOS invitations to address parliament in this manner are determined by the presiding officer on the advice of the parliamentary bureau . EOS
SOS speakers are drawn from across scotland and are chosen to represent the balance of religious beliefs according to the scottish census . EOS
SOS faith groups can make direct representations to the presiding officer to nominate speakers . EOS
SOS the presiding officer -lrb- or deputy presiding officer -rrb- decides who speaks in chamber debates and the amount of time for which they are allowed to speak . EOS
SOS the presiding officer -lrb- or deputy presiding officer -rrb- decides who speaks in chamber debates and the amount of time for which they are allowed to speak . EOS
SOS normally , the presiding officer tries to achieve a balance between different viewpoints and political parties when selecting members to speak . EOS
SOS typically , ministers or party leaders open debates , with opening speakers given between 5 and 20 minutes , and succeeding speakers allocated less time . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament has conducted debates in the gaelic language . EOS
SOS each sitting day , normally at 5 pm , msps decide on all the motions and amendments that have been moved that day . EOS
SOS this " decision time " is heralded by the sounding of the division bell , which is heard throughout the parliamentary campus and UNK msps who are not in the chamber to return and vote . EOS
SOS this " decision time " is heralded by the sounding of the division bell , which is heard throughout the parliamentary campus and UNK msps who are not in the chamber to return and vote . EOS
SOS if there is audible dissent , the presiding officer UNK " there will be a division " and members vote by means of electronic consoles on their desks . EOS
SOS as a result , the outcome of each division is known in seconds . EOS
SOS the outcome of most votes can be predicted beforehand since political parties normally instruct members which way to vote . EOS
SOS the outcome of most votes can be predicted beforehand since political parties normally instruct members which way to vote . EOS
SOS parties entrust some msps , known as whips , with the task of ensuring that party members vote according to the party line . EOS
SOS this is typically done on moral issues . EOS
SOS UNK members can be UNK as official party candidates during future elections , and , in serious cases , may be expelled from their parties outright . EOS
SOS immediately after decision time a " members debate " is held , which lasts for 45 minutes . EOS
SOS members business is a debate on a motion proposed by an msp who is not a scottish minister . EOS
SOS immediately after decision time a " members debate " is held , which lasts for 45 minutes . EOS
SOS as well as the proposer , other members normally contribute to the debate . EOS
SOS the relevant minister , whose department the debate and motion relate to " winds up " the debate by speaking after all other participants . EOS
SOS much of the work of the scottish parliament is done in committee . EOS
SOS the role of committees is stronger in the scottish parliament than in other parliamentary systems , partly as a means of strengthening the role of UNK in their scrutiny of the government and partly to compensate for the fact that there is no revising chamber . EOS
SOS the role of committees is stronger in the scottish parliament than in other parliamentary systems , partly as a means of strengthening the role of UNK in their scrutiny of the government and partly to compensate for the fact that there is no revising chamber . EOS
SOS the principal role of committees in the scottish parliament is to take evidence from witnesses , conduct inquiries and scrutinise legislation . EOS
SOS committees can also meet at other locations throughout scotland . EOS
SOS committees comprise a small number of msps , with membership reflecting the balance of parties across parliament . EOS
SOS committees comprise a small number of msps , with membership reflecting the balance of parties across parliament . EOS
SOS there are different committees with their functions set out in different ways . EOS
SOS mandatory committees are committees which are set down under the scottish parliament 's standing orders , which govern their remits and proceedings . EOS
SOS the current mandatory committees in the fourth session of the scottish parliament are : public audit ; equal opportunities ; european and external relations ; finance ; public petitions ; standards , procedures and public appointments ; and delegated powers and law reform . EOS
SOS subject committees are established at the beginning of each parliamentary session , and again the members on each committee reflect the balance of parties across parliament . EOS
SOS typically each committee corresponds with one -lrb- or more -rrb- of the departments -lrb- or ministries -rrb- of the scottish government . EOS
SOS the current subject committees in the fourth session are : economy , energy and tourism ; education and culture ; health and sport ; justice ; local government and regeneration ; rural affairs , climate change and environment ; welfare reform ; and infrastructure and capital investment . EOS
SOS the current subject committees in the fourth session are : economy , energy and tourism ; education and culture ; health and sport ; justice ; local government and regeneration ; rural affairs , climate change and environment ; welfare reform ; and infrastructure and capital investment . EOS
SOS a further type of committee is normally set up to scrutinise private bills submitted to the scottish parliament by an outside party or promoter who is not a member of the scottish parliament or scottish government . EOS
SOS private bills normally relate to large-scale development projects such as infrastructure projects that require the use of land or property . EOS
SOS private bill committees have been set up to consider legislation on issues such as the development of the edinburgh tram network , the glasgow airport rail link , the UNK rail link and extensions to the national gallery of scotland . EOS
SOS the scotland act 1998 , which was passed by the parliament of the united kingdom and given royal assent by queen elizabeth ii on 19 november 1998 , governs the functions and role of the scottish parliament and delimits its legislative competence . EOS
SOS the scotland act 1998 , which was passed by the parliament of the united kingdom and given royal assent by queen elizabeth ii on 19 november 1998 , governs the functions and role of the scottish parliament and delimits its legislative competence . EOS
SOS the scotland act 2012 extends the devolved competencies . EOS
SOS for the purposes of parliamentary sovereignty , the parliament of the united kingdom at westminster continues to constitute the supreme legislature of scotland . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament has the power to pass laws and has limited UNK capability . EOS
SOS the specific devolved matters are all subjects which are not explicitly stated in schedule 5 to the scotland act as reserved matters . EOS
SOS all matters that are not specifically reserved are automatically devolved to the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS all matters that are not specifically reserved are automatically devolved to the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament has the ability to alter income tax in scotland by up to 3 pence in the pound . EOS
SOS the 2012 act conferred further fiscal devolution including borrowing powers and some other unconnected matters such as setting speed limits and control of air guns . EOS
SOS reserved matters are subjects that are outside the legislative competence of the scotland parliament . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament is unable to legislate on such issues that are reserved to , and dealt with at , westminster -lrb- and where ministerial functions usually lie with uk government ministers -rrb- . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament is unable to legislate on such issues that are reserved to , and dealt with at , westminster -lrb- and where ministerial functions usually lie with uk government ministers -rrb- . EOS
SOS the scottish parliament is unable to legislate on such issues that are reserved to , and dealt with at , westminster -lrb- and where ministerial functions usually lie with uk government ministers -rrb- . EOS
SOS bills can be introduced to parliament in a number of ways ; the scottish government can introduce new laws or amendments to existing laws as a bill ; a committee of the parliament can present a bill in one of the areas under its remit ; a member of the scottish parliament can introduce a bill as a private member ; or a private bill can be submitted to parliament by an outside proposer . EOS

EOS

EOS
SOS bills can be introduced to parliament in a number of ways ; the scottish government can introduce new laws or amendments to existing laws as a bill ; a committee of the parliament can present a bill in one of the areas under its remit ; a member of the scottish parliament can introduce a bill as a private member ; or a private bill can be submitted to parliament by an outside proposer . EOS
SOS bills pass through parliament in a number of stages : EOS
SOS stage 1 is the first , or introductory stage of the bill , where the minister or member in charge of the bill will formally introduce it to parliament together with its accompanying documents -- explanatory notes , a policy memorandum setting out the policy underlying the bill , and a financial memorandum setting out the costs and savings associated with it . EOS
SOS stage 1 is the first , or introductory stage of the bill , where the minister or member in charge of the bill will formally introduce it to parliament together with its accompanying documents -- explanatory notes , a policy memorandum setting out the policy underlying the bill , and a financial memorandum setting out the costs and savings associated with it . EOS
SOS statements from the presiding officer and the member in charge of the bill are also lodged indicating whether the bill is within the legislative competence of the parliament . EOS
SOS stage 1 usually takes place , initially , in the relevant committee or committees and is then submitted to the whole parliament for a full debate in the chamber on the general principles of the bill . EOS
SOS if the whole parliament agrees in a vote to the general principles of the bill , it then proceeds to stage 2 . EOS
SOS stage 3 is the final stage of the bill and is considered at a meeting of the whole parliament . EOS
SOS this stage comprises two parts : consideration of amendments to the bill as a general debate , and a final vote on the bill . EOS
SOS this stage comprises two parts : consideration of amendments to the bill as a general debate , and a final vote on the bill . EOS
SOS opposition members can table " wrecking amendments " to the bill , designed to UNK further progress and take up parliamentary time , to cause the bill to fall without a final vote being taken . EOS
SOS after a general debate on the final form of the bill , members proceed to vote at decision time on whether they agree to the general principles of the final bill . EOS
SOS royal assent : after the bill has been passed , the presiding officer submits it to the monarch for royal assent and it becomes an act of the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS royal assent : after the bill has been passed , the presiding officer submits it to the monarch for royal assent and it becomes an act of the scottish parliament . EOS
SOS however he can not do so until a UNK period has elapsed , during which the law officers of the scottish government or uk government can refer the bill to the supreme court of the united kingdom for a ruling on whether it is within the powers of the parliament . EOS
SOS however he can not do so until a UNK period has elapsed , during which the law officers of the scottish government or uk government can refer the bill to the supreme court of the united kingdom for a ruling on whether it is within the powers of the parliament . EOS
SOS instead they begin with a phrase that reads : " the bill for this act of the scottish parliament was passed by the parliament on -lsb- date -rsb- and received royal assent on -lsb- date -rsb- " . EOS
SOS the party , or parties , that hold the majority of seats in the parliament forms the scottish government . EOS
SOS any member can put their name forward to be first minister , and a vote is taken by all members of parliament . EOS
SOS in contrast to many other parliamentary systems , parliament elects a first minister from a number of candidates at the beginning of each parliamentary term -lrb- after a general election -rrb- . EOS
SOS most ministers and their juniors are drawn from amongst the elected msps , with the exception of scotland 's chief law officers : the lord advocate and the solicitor general . EOS
SOS whilst the first minister chooses the ministers -- and may decide to remove them at any time -- the formal appointment or dismissal is made by the sovereign . EOS
SOS under the scotland act 1998 , ordinary general elections for the scottish parliament are held on the first thursday in may every four years -lrb- 1999 , 2003 , 2007 and so on -rrb- . EOS
SOS under the scotland act 1998 , ordinary general elections for the scottish parliament are held on the first thursday in may every four years -lrb- 1999 , 2003 , 2007 and so on -rrb- . EOS
SOS the date of the poll may be varied by up to one month either way by the monarch on the proposal of the presiding officer . EOS
SOS extraordinary general elections are in addition to ordinary general elections , unless held less than six months before the due date of an ordinary general election , in which case they supplant it . EOS
SOS if the parliament itself resolves that it should be dissolved -lrb- with at least two-thirds of the members voting in favour -rrb- , or if the parliament fails to nominate one of its members to be first minister within 28 days of a general election or of the position becoming vacant , the presiding officer proposes a date for an extraordinary general election and the parliament is dissolved by the queen by royal proclamation . EOS
SOS several procedures enable the scottish parliament to scrutinise the government . EOS
SOS the first minister or members of the cabinet can deliver statements to parliament upon which msps are invited to question . EOS
SOS for example , at the beginning of each parliamentary year , the first minister delivers a statement to the chamber setting out the government 's legislative programme for the UNK year . EOS
SOS after the statement has been delivered , the leaders of the opposition parties and other msps question the first minister on issues related to the substance of the statement . EOS
SOS parliamentary time is also set aside for question periods in the debating chamber . EOS
SOS a " general question time " takes place on a thursday between UNK a.m. and 12 p.m. where members can direct questions to any member of the scottish government . EOS
SOS a " general question time " takes place on a thursday between UNK a.m. and 12 p.m. where members can direct questions to any member of the scottish government . EOS
SOS this gives members an opportunity to question the first minister directly on issues under their jurisdiction . EOS
SOS the four general questions available to opposition leaders are : EOS
SOS of the 129 msps , 73 are elected to represent first past the post constituencies and are known as " constituency msps " . EOS
SOS the 73 scottish parliament constituencies shared the same boundaries as the uk parliament constituencies in scotland , prior to the 2005 reduction in the number of scottish mps , with the exception of UNK and shetland which each return their own constituency msp . EOS
SOS voters choose one member to represent the constituency , and the member with most votes is returned as a constituency msp . EOS
SOS the island archipelagos of UNK , shetland and the western isles comprise a much smaller number of electors , due to their dispersed population and distance from the scottish parliament in edinburgh . EOS
SOS currently , the average scottish parliament constituency comprises 55,000 electors . EOS
SOS the total number of seats in the parliament are allocated to parties proportionally to the number of votes received in the second vote of the ballot using the d'hondt method . EOS
SOS the total number of seats in the parliament are allocated to parties proportionally to the number of votes received in the second vote of the ballot using the d'hondt method . EOS
SOS the party with the highest quotient is awarded the seat , which is then added to its constituency seats in allocating the second seat . EOS
SOS the party with the highest quotient is awarded the seat , which is then added to its constituency seats in allocating the second seat . EOS
SOS this is repeated UNK until all available list seats are allocated . EOS
SOS as in the house of commons , a number of qualifications apply to being an msp . EOS
SOS such qualifications were introduced under the house of commons disqualification act 1975 and the british nationality act 1981 . EOS
SOS members of the police and the armed forces are disqualified from sitting in the scottish parliament as elected msps , and similarly , civil servants and members of foreign legislatures are disqualified . EOS
SOS an individual may not sit in the scottish parliament if he or she is judged to be insane under the terms of the mental health -lrb- care and treatment -rrb- -lrb- scotland -rrb- act 2003 . EOS
SOS the election produced a majority snp government , making this the first time in the scottish parliament where a party has commanded a parliamentary majority . EOS
SOS the snp took 16 seats from labour , with many of their key figures not returned to parliament , although labour leader UNK gray retained east lothian by 151 votes . EOS
SOS the snp took 16 seats from labour , with many of their key figures not returned to parliament , although labour leader UNK gray retained east lothian by 151 votes . EOS
SOS the snp took a further eight seats from the liberal democrats and one seat from the conservatives . EOS
SOS the snp overall majority meant that there was sufficient support in the scottish parliament to hold a referendum on scottish independence . EOS
SOS for the conservatives , the main disappointment was the loss of edinburgh UNK , the seat of former party leader david mcletchie , to the snp . EOS
SOS for the conservatives , the main disappointment was the loss of edinburgh UNK , the seat of former party leader david mcletchie , to the snp . EOS
SOS mcletchie was elected on the lothian regional list and the conservatives suffered a net loss of five seats , with leader UNK goldie claiming that their support had held firm . EOS

SOS a procedural consequence of the establishment of the scottish parliament is that scottish mps sitting in the uk house of commons are able to vote on domestic legislation that applies only to england , wales and northern ireland -- whilst english , scottish , welsh and northern irish westminster mps are unable to vote on the domestic legislation of the scottish parliament . EOS

EOS
SOS this phenomenon is known as the west lothian question and has led to criticism . EOS
SOS following the conservative victory in the 2015 uk election , standing orders of the house of commons were changed to give mps representing english constituencies a new " veto " over laws only affecting england . EOS

SOS islamism , also known as political islam -lrb- arabic : UNK siys -rrb- , is an islamic revival movement often characterized by moral conservatism , literalism , and the attempt " to implement islamic values in all spheres of life . " EOS
SOS islamism , also known as political islam -lrb- arabic : UNK siys -rrb- , is an islamic revival movement often characterized by moral conservatism , literalism , and the attempt " to implement islamic values in all spheres of life . " EOS
SOS islamism favors the UNK of government and society in accordance with the UNK . EOS
SOS the different islamist movements have been described as " oscillating between two poles " : at one end is a strategy of islamization of society through state power seized by revolution or invasion ; at the other " reformist " pole islamists work to islamize society gradually " from the bottom up " . EOS
SOS the different islamist movements have been described as " oscillating between two poles " : at one end is a strategy of islamization of society through state power seized by revolution or invasion ; at the other " reformist " pole islamists work to islamize society gradually " from the bottom up " . EOS
SOS moderate and reformist islamists who accept and work within the democratic process include parties like the tunisian UNK movement . EOS
SOS the islamist groups like hezbollah in lebanon and hamas in palestine participate in democratic and political process as well as armed attacks , seeking to abolish the state of israel . EOS
SOS the islamist groups like hezbollah in lebanon and hamas in palestine participate in democratic and political process as well as armed attacks , seeking to abolish the state of israel . EOS
SOS radical islamist organizations like al-qaeda and the egyptian islamic jihad , and groups such as the taliban , entirely reject democracy , often declaring as UNK those muslims who support it -lrb- see UNK -rrb- , as well as calling for UNK jihad or urging and conducting attacks on a religious basis . EOS

EOS
SOS another major division within islamism is between what graham e. fuller has described as the fundamentalist " guardians of the tradition " -lrb- UNK , such as those in the wahhabi movement -rrb- and the " vanguard of change and islamic reform " centered around the muslim brotherhood . EOS
SOS olivier roy argues that " sunni UNK underwent a remarkable shift in the second half of the 20th century " when the muslim brotherhood movement and its focus on UNK of pan-arabism was eclipsed by the salafi movement with its emphasis on " sharia rather than the building of islamic institutions , " and rejection of shia islam . EOS
SOS following the arab spring , roy has described islamism as " increasingly UNK " with democracy in much of the arab muslim world , such that " neither can now survive without the other . " EOS
SOS while islamist political culture itself may not be democratic , islamists need democratic elections to maintain their legitimacy . EOS

SOS sayyid abul ala maududi was an important early twentieth-century figure in the islamic revival in india , and then after independence from britain , in pakistan . EOS
SOS trained as a lawyer he chose the profession of journalism , and wrote about contemporary issues and most importantly about islam and islamic law . EOS
SOS maududi founded the UNK party in 1941 and remained its leader until 1972 . EOS
SOS however , maududi had much more impact through his writing than through his political organising . EOS
SOS his extremely influential books -lrb- translated into many languages -rrb- placed islam in a modern context , and influenced not only conservative UNK but liberal modernizer islamists such as UNK , whose " islamization of knowledge " carried forward some of maududi 's key principles . EOS

SOS another factor in the early 1990s that worked to radicalize the islamist movement was the gulf war , which brought several hundred thousand us and allied non-muslim military personnel to saudi arabian soil to put an end to saddam hussein 's occupation of kuwait . EOS
SOS prior to 1990 saudi arabia played an important role in UNK the many islamist groups that received its aid . EOS
SOS but when saddam , secularist and UNK dictator of neighboring iraq , attacked saudi arabia -lrb- his enemy in the war -rrb- , western troops came to protect the saudi monarchy . EOS
SOS islamists accused the saudi regime of being a puppet of the west . EOS
SOS these attacks resonated with conservative muslims and the problem did not go away with saddam 's defeat either , since american troops remained stationed in the kingdom , and a de facto cooperation with the UNK peace process developed . EOS

SOS its name originated from the latin word " imperium " , which means to rule over large territories . EOS
SOS imperialism is " a policy of extending a country 's power and influence through colonization , use of military force , or other means " . EOS
SOS the term imperialism has been applied to western -lrb- and japanese -rrb- political and economic dominance especially in asia and africa in the 19th and 20th centuries . EOS
SOS it has also allowed for the rapid spread of technologies and ideas . EOS
SOS imperialism is defined as " a policy of extending a country 's power and influence through diplomacy or military force . " EOS
SOS " formal imperialism " is defined as " physical control or full-fledged colonial rule " . EOS
SOS this is often through various forms of " UNK " -lrb- see other -rrb- based on racial , religious , or cultural stereotypes . EOS
SOS " informal imperialism " is less direct ; however , it is still a powerful form of dominance . EOS
SOS to clear out this confusion about the definition of imperialism one could speak of " formal " and " informal " imperialism , the first meaning physical control or " full-fledged colonial rule " while the second implied less direct rule though still containing UNK kinds of dominance . EOS
SOS the definition of imperialism has not been finalized for centuries and was UNK seen to represent the policies of major powers , or simply , general-purpose UNK . EOS
SOS this is because , with informal rule , the control is spread more subtly through technological superiority , enforcing land officials into large debts that can not be repaid , ownership of private industries thus expanding the controlled area , or having countries agree to uneven trade agreements forcefully . EOS
