SOS the greatest distinction of an empire is through the amount of land that a nation has conquered and expanded . EOS
SOS european expansion caused the world to be divided by how developed and developing nation are portrayed through the world systems theory . EOS
SOS the russian leader lenin suggested that " imperialism was the highest form of capitalism , claiming that imperialism developed after colonialism , and was distinguished from colonialism by monopoly capitalism " . EOS
SOS UNK now focuses on states becoming major economic players in the market ; some states today are viewed as empires due to their political and economic authority over other nations . EOS
SOS european empires in asia and africa " have come to be seen as the classic forms of imperialism : and indeed most books on the subject confine themselves to the european seaborne empires " . EOS
SOS the term " imperialism " is often UNK with " colonialism " , however many scholars have argued that each have their own distinct definition . EOS
SOS contiguous land empires such as the russian or ottoman are generally excluded from discussions of colonialism . UNK thus it can be said that imperialism includes some form of colonialism , but colonialism itself does not automatically imply imperialism , as it lacks a political focus . EOS
SOS robert young writes that while imperialism operates from the center , is a state policy and is developed for ideological as well as financial reasons , colonialism is simply the development for settlement or commercial intentions . EOS
SOS contiguous land empires such as the russian or ottoman are generally excluded from discussions of colonialism . UNK thus it can be said that imperialism includes some form of colonialism , but colonialism itself does not automatically imply imperialism , as it lacks a political focus . EOS
SOS imperialism and colonialism have been used in order to describe one 's superiority , domination and influence upon a person or group of people . EOS
SOS imperialism and colonialism both dictate the political and economic advantage over a land and the indigenous populations they control , yet scholars sometimes find it difficult to illustrate the difference between the two . EOS
SOS although imperialism and colonialism focus on the suppression of an other , if colonialism refers to the process of a country taking physical control of another , imperialism refers to the political and monetary dominance , either formally or informally . EOS
SOS the meaning of imperialism is to create an empire , by conquering the other state 's lands and therefore increasing its own dominance . EOS
SOS colonialism 's core meaning is the exploitation of the valuable assets and supplies of the nation that was conquered and the conquering nation then gaining the benefits from the spoils of the war . EOS
SOS colonialism can completely change the existing social structure , physical structure and economics of an area ; it is not unusual that the characteristics of the conquering peoples are inherited by the conquered indigenous populations . EOS
SOS a controversial aspect of imperialism is the defense and justification of empire-building based on seemingly rational grounds . EOS
SOS friedrich ratzel believed that in order for a state to survive , imperialism was needed . EOS
SOS j. a. hobson identifies this justification on general grounds as : " it is desirable that the earth should be UNK , governed , and developed , as far as possible , by the races which can do this work best , i.e . by the races of highest ` social efficiency ' " . EOS
SOS the purportedly scientific nature of " social darwinism " and a theory of races formed a supposedly rational justification for imperialism . EOS
SOS the rhetoric of UNK being racially superior appears to have achieved its purpose , for example throughout latin america " UNK " is still prized today and various forms of UNK -lrb- whitening -rrb- are common . EOS
SOS these societies also served as a space for travellers to share these stories.political geographers such as friedrich ratzel of germany and halford mackinder of britain also supported imperialism . EOS

SOS the royal geographical society of london and other geographical societies in europe had great influence and were able to fund travelers who would come back with tales of their discoveries . EOS
SOS geographical theories such as environmental determinism also suggested that tropical environments created uncivilized people in need of european guidance . EOS
SOS for instance , american geographer ellen churchill UNK argued that even though human beings originated in the tropics they were only able to become fully human in the temperate zone . EOS
SOS UNK can be paralleled with edward said 's orientalism as the west 's construction of the east as the " other " . EOS

SOS orientalism , as theorized by edward said , refers to how the west developed an imaginative geography of the east . EOS
SOS this difference was particularly apparent in textual and visual works of early european studies of the orient that positioned the east as irrational and backward in opposition to the rational and progressive west . EOS
SOS defining the east as a negative vision of itself , as its inferior , not only increased the west 's sense of self , but also was a way of ordering the east and making it known to the west so that it could be dominated and controlled . EOS
SOS the discourse of orientalism therefore served as an ideological justification of early western imperialism , as it formed a body of knowledge and ideas that UNK social , cultural , political , and economic control of other territories . EOS
SOS this difference was particularly apparent in textual and visual works of early european studies of the orient that positioned the east as irrational and backward in opposition to the rational and progressive west . EOS
SOS to better illustrate this idea , bassett focuses his analysis of the role of nineteenth-century maps during the " scramble for africa " . EOS
SOS this provided incentives for imperial and colonial powers to obtain " information to fill in blank spaces on contemporary maps " . EOS
SOS during his analysis of nineteenth-century UNK techniques , he highlights the use of blank space to denote unknown or UNK territory . EOS
SOS he states that maps " contributed to empire by promoting , assisting , and legitimizing the extension of french and british power into west africa " . EOS

SOS cultural imperialism is when a country 's influence is felt in social and cultural circles , i.e . its soft power , such that it changes the moral , cultural and societal worldview of another . EOS
SOS for example , depictions of opulent american lifestyles in the soap opera dallas during the cold war changed the expectations of romanians ; a more recent example is the influence of smuggled south korean drama series in north korea . EOS
SOS nor is such a usage of culture recent , as part of roman imperialism local elites would be exposed to the benefits and luxuries of roman culture and lifestyle , with the aim that they would then become willing participants . EOS
SOS the importance of soft power is not lost on authoritarian regimes , fighting such influence with bans on foreign popular culture , control of the internet and unauthorised satellite dishes etc . . EOS

SOS -lsb- attribution needed -rsb- because of the resources made available by imperialism , the world 's economy grew significantly and became much more interconnected in the decades before world war i , making the many imperial powers rich and prosperous . EOS
SOS europe 's expansion into territorial imperialism was largely focused on economic growth by collecting resources from colonies , in combination with assuming political control by military and political means . EOS
SOS the colonization of india in the mid-18th century offers an example of this focus : there , the " british exploited the political weakness of the mughal state , and , while military activity was important at various times , the economic and administrative incorporation of local elites was also of crucial significance " for the establishment of control over the subcontinent 's resources , markets , and manpower . EOS

EOS
SOS along with advancements in communication , europe also continued to advance in military technology . EOS
SOS european chemists made deadly explosives that could be used in combat , and with innovations in machinery they were able to manufacture improved firearms . EOS
SOS this technology gave european armies an advantage over their opponents , as armies in UNK countries were still fighting with arrows , swords , and leather shields -lrb- e.g . the UNK in southern africa during the anglo-zulu war of 1879 -rrb- . EOS
SOS in anglophone academic works , theories regarding imperialism are often based on the british experience . EOS
SOS the term " imperialism " was originally introduced into english in its present sense in the late 1870s by opponents of the allegedly aggressive and UNK imperial policies of british prime minister benjamin disraeli . EOS
SOS for some , imperialism designated a policy of idealism and philanthropy ; others alleged that it was characterized by political self-interest , and a growing number associated it with capitalist greed . EOS
SOS in his writings lenin portrayed imperialism as a natural extension of capitalism that arose from need for capitalist economies to constantly expand investment , material resources and manpower in such a way that necessitated colonial expansion . EOS
SOS the correlation between capitalism , aristocracy , and imperialism has long been debated among historians and political theorists . EOS
SOS their combined work informed the study of imperialism and it 's impact on europe , as well as contributed to reflections on the rise of the UNK complex in the united states from the 1950s . EOS
SOS while these UNK writers were at their most prolific before world war i , they remained active in the interwar years . EOS
SOS hobson argued that domestic social reforms could cure the international disease of imperialism by removing its economic foundation . EOS
SOS hobson theorized that state intervention through taxation could boost broader consumption , create wealth , and encourage a peaceful , tolerant , UNK world order . EOS
SOS the concept environmental determinism served as a moral justification for domination of certain territories and peoples . EOS
SOS it was believed that a certain person 's behaviours were determined by the environment in which they lived and thus validated their domination . EOS
SOS for example , people living in tropical environments were seen as " less civilized " therefore justifying colonial control as a UNK mission . EOS
SOS across the three waves of european colonialism -lrb- first in the americas , second in asia and lastly in africa -rrb- , environmental determinism was used to categorically place indigenous people in a racial hierarchy . EOS
SOS this takes two forms , orientalism and UNK . EOS
SOS according to geographic scholars under colonizing empires , the world could be split into climatic zones . EOS
SOS these scholars believed that northern europe and the mid-atlantic temperate climate produced a hard-working , moral , and UNK human being . EOS
SOS the people of these climates were believed to be in need of guidance and intervention from the european empire to aid in the governing of a more evolved social structure ; they were seen as incapable of such a feat . EOS
SOS similarly , orientalism is a view of a people based on their geographical location . EOS

SOS moreover , in 2011 and 2012 , the united methodist church 's general board of church and society called on all united methodists to abstain from alcohol for lent . EOS

SOS in addition , the united methodist church prohibits the celebration of same-sex unions . EOS
SOS rev . jimmy UNK was defrocked after a highly publicized church trial in 1999 on account of his participation in same-sex union ceremonies . EOS
SOS moreover , some churches , especially in 2016 after same-sex marriage was legalized nationwide , have provided blessings for same-sex marriages . EOS
SOS for example , the UNK table , a governing committee , has voted in favor of a proposal that calls for a localized option , which would permit ministers to UNK same-sex weddings , and it would allow conferences to ordain gay clergy . EOS
SOS additionally , many organizations , conferences , and congregations have recently called for broader acceptance of the lgbt community within the umc . EOS
SOS moreover , many conferences have taken a position by voting in favor of UNK marriages with resolutions . EOS
SOS in 1987 , a united methodist church court in new hampshire defrocked methodist minister rose mary UNK for openly living with a same-sex partner . EOS
SOS in 2005 , clergy credentials were removed from irene elizabeth stroud after she was convicted in a church trial of violating church law by engaging in a lesbian relationship ; this conviction was later upheld by the judicial council , the highest court in the denomination . EOS
SOS the UNK conference of the umc has approved the appointment of an openly partnered lesbian to the provisional UNK . EOS
SOS the united methodist church opposes conscription as incompatible with the teaching of scripture . EOS
SOS the church also states that " as christians they are aware that neither the way of military action , nor the way of inaction is always righteous before god . " EOS
SOS therefore , the church supports and extends its ministry to those persons who UNK oppose all war , or any particular war , and who therefore refuse to serve in the armed forces or to cooperate with systems of military conscription . EOS
SOS the united methodist church maintains that war is incompatible with christ 's message and teachings . EOS
SOS therefore , the church rejects war as an instrument of national foreign policy , to be employed only as a last resort in the prevention of such evils as genocide , brutal suppression of human rights , and UNK international aggression . EOS
SOS consequently , the united methodist church endorses general and complete disarmament under strict and effective international control . EOS
SOS the sexual ethics task force of the united methodist church states that " research shows it -lsb- pornography -rsb- is not an ` innocent activity . ' EOS
SOS the united methodist church teaches that pornography is " about violence , degradation , exploitation , and coercion " and " UNK -lsb- s -rsb- all forms of commercialization , abuse , and exploitation of sex . " EOS
SOS persons who are addicted to pornography are physiologically altered , as is their perspective , relationships with UNK and family , and their perceptions of girls and women . " EOS
SOS the umc supports federal funding for research on embryos created for UNK that remain after the UNK efforts have ceased , if the embryos were provided for research instead of being destroyed , were not obtained by sale , and those donating had given prior informed consent for the research purposes . EOS
SOS it supports research on stem cells retrieved from UNK cords and adult stem cells , stating that there are " few moral questions " raised by this issue . EOS
SOS the umc stands in " opposition to the creation of embryos for the sake of research " as " a human embryo , even at its earliest stages , commands our reverence . " EOS

SOS the united methodist church is organized into conferences . EOS
SOS the highest level is called the general conference and is the only organization which may speak officially for the church . EOS
SOS legislative changes are recorded in the book of discipline which is revised after each general conference . EOS
SOS the highest level is called the general conference and is the only organization which may speak officially for the church . EOS
SOS the general conference meets every four years -lrb- UNK -rrb- . EOS
SOS the united states is divided into five jurisdictions : northeastern , southeastern , north central , south central and western . EOS
SOS outside the united states the church is divided into seven central conferences : africa , congo , west africa , central & southern europe , germany , northern europe and the philippines . EOS
SOS the main purpose of the jurisdictions and central conferences is to elect and appoint bishops , the chief administrators of the church . EOS
SOS the main purpose of the jurisdictions and central conferences is to elect and appoint bishops , the chief administrators of the church . EOS

SOS the annual conference , roughly the equivalent of a diocese in the anglican communion and the roman catholic church or a synod in some lutheran denominations such as the evangelical lutheran church in america , is the basic unit of organization within the umc . EOS
SOS the term annual conference is often used to refer to the geographical area it covers as well as the frequency of meeting . EOS
SOS clergy are members of their annual conference rather than of any local congregation , and are appointed to a local church or other charge annually by the conference 's resident bishop at the meeting of the annual conference . EOS
SOS the book of discipline is the UNK for local churches and pastors and describes in considerable detail the organizational structure of local united methodist churches . EOS
SOS all UNK churches must have a board of trustees with at least three members and no more than nine members and it is recommended that no gender should hold more than a 2/3 majority . EOS
SOS all UNK churches must have a board of trustees with at least three members and no more than nine members and it is recommended that no gender should hold more than a 2/3 majority . EOS
SOS the church conference is an annual meeting of all the officers of the church and any interested members . EOS
SOS as such , the united methodist church established and is affiliated with around one hundred colleges and universities in the united states , including syracuse university , boston university , UNK university , duke university , drew university , university of denver , university of UNK , and southern methodist university . EOS
SOS the church operates three hundred sixty schools and institutions overseas . EOS
SOS most are members of the international association of UNK schools , colleges , and universities . EOS
SOS the first methodist clergy were ordained by john wesley , a priest of the church of england , because of the crisis caused by the american revolution which isolated the methodists in the states from the church of england and its sacraments . EOS
SOS they generally serve as pastors in local congregations . EOS
SOS elders in full connection are each a member of their annual conference order of elders . EOS
SOS likewise each deacon in full connection is a member of their annual conference order of deacons . EOS
SOS all clergy appointments are made and fixed annually by the resident bishop on the advice of the annual conference cabinet , which is composed of the area UNK -lrb- if one is appointed -rrb- and the several district superintendents of the districts of the annual conference . EOS
SOS while an appointment is made one year at a time , it is most common for an appointment to be continued for multiple years . EOS
SOS until the bishop has read the appointments at the session of the annual conference , no appointments are officially fixed . EOS
SOS elders are called by god , affirmed by the church , and ordained by a bishop to a ministry of word , sacrament , order and service within the church . EOS
SOS elders serve a term of 2 -- 3 years as provisional elders prior to their ordination . EOS
SOS elders may also be assigned as district superintendents , and they are eligible for election to the UNK . EOS
SOS deacons serve a term of 2 -- 3 years as provisional deacons prior to their ordination . EOS
SOS deacons give leadership , preach the word , contribute in worship , conduct marriages , bury the dead , and aid the church in UNK its mission within the world . EOS
SOS deacons assist elders in the sacraments of holy communion and baptism , and may be granted sacramental authority if they are appointed as the pastor in a local church . EOS
SOS deacons assist elders in the sacraments of holy communion and baptism , and may be granted sacramental authority if they are appointed as the pastor in a local church . EOS
SOS at the 1996 general conference the ordination order of transitional deacon was abolished . EOS
SOS the provisional UNK is a seminary graduate who serves a UNK term in a full-time appointment after being commissioned . EOS
SOS a local pastor 's official title is ` licensed local pastor ' and is appointed as clergy to the local church where they preach , conduct divine worship and perform the regular duties of a pastor . EOS
SOS the licensed local pastor has the authority of a pastor only within the context and during the time of the appointment and shall not extend beyond it . EOS
SOS local pastors are not required to have advanced degrees but are required to attend licensing school and attend and pass an approved five-year course of study at an approved united methodist seminary or course of study school , successfully complete written and oral examinations , and appear before the district committee on ministry and the conference board of ordained ministry . EOS
SOS they may continue towards associate membership allowing them to retire as clergy . EOS
SOS baptized members are those who have been baptized as an infant or child , but who have not subsequently professed their own faith . EOS
SOS these baptized members become professing members through confirmation and sometimes the profession of faith . EOS
SOS individuals may also become a professing member through transfer from another christian denomination . EOS
SOS unlike confirmation and profession of faith , baptism is a sacrament in the umc . EOS
SOS in confirmation and membership preparation classes , students learn about church and the UNK theological tradition in order to profess their ultimate faith in christ . EOS
SOS the book of discipline of the united methodist church directs the local church to offer membership preparation or confirmation classes to all people , including adults . EOS
SOS in confirmation and membership preparation classes , students learn about church and the UNK theological tradition in order to profess their ultimate faith in christ . EOS
SOS there are two categories of lay servants : local church lay servant , who serve in and through their local churches , and certified lay servants , who serve in their own churches , in other churches , and through district or conference projects and programs . EOS
SOS to be recognized as local church lay servant , they must be recommended by their pastor and church council or charge conference , and complete the basic course for lay servant . EOS
SOS they must report and reapply annually ; and they must complete at least one advanced course every three years . EOS
SOS they must report and reapply annually ; and they must complete at least one advanced course every three years . EOS
SOS the united methodist church is one tradition within the christian church . EOS
SOS in addition , it voted to seek observer status in the national association of evangelicals and in the world evangelical fellowship . EOS
SOS however , there are some in the united methodist church who feel that false ecumenism might result in the " blurring of theological and confessional differences in the interests of unity . " EOS
SOS a commission on pan methodist cooperation and union formed in 2000 to carry out work on such a merger . EOS
SOS in may 2012 , the united methodist church entered into full communion with the african methodist episcopal church , african methodist episcopal zion church , african union methodist protestant church , christian methodist episcopal church , and union american methodist episcopal church , in which these churches agreed to " recognize each other 's churches , share sacraments , and affirm their clergy and ministries . " EOS
SOS the united methodist church has since 1985 been exploring a possible merger with three historically african-american methodist denominations : the african methodist episcopal church , the african methodist episcopal zion church , and the christian methodist episcopal church . EOS

SOS the french and indian war -lrb- 1754 -- 1763 -rrb- was the north american theater of the worldwide seven years ' war . EOS
SOS the war was fought between the colonies of british america and new france , with both sides supported by military units from their parent countries of great britain and france , as well as native american allies . EOS
SOS at the start of the war , the french north american colonies had a population of roughly 60,000 european settlers , compared with 2 million in the british north american colonies . EOS
SOS at the start of the war , the french north american colonies had a population of roughly 60,000 european settlers , compared with 2 million in the british north american colonies . EOS
SOS the war was fought primarily along the frontiers between new france and the british colonies , from virginia in the south to nova scotia in the north . EOS
SOS the dispute erupted into violence in the battle of jumonville glen in may 1754 , during which virginia militiamen under the command of UNK george washington ambushed a french patrol . EOS
SOS in 1755 , six colonial governors in north america met with general edward braddock , the newly arrived british army commander , and planned a four-way attack on the french . EOS
SOS none succeeded and the main effort by braddock was a disaster ; he was defeated in the battle of the monongahela on july 9 , 1755 and died a few days later . EOS
SOS british operations in 1755 , 1756 and 1757 in the frontier areas of pennsylvania and new york all failed , due to a combination of poor management , internal divisions , and effective canadian scouts , french regular forces , and indian warrior allies . EOS
SOS in 1755 , the british captured fort beausjour on the border separating nova scotia from acadia ; soon afterward they ordered the expulsion of the acadians . EOS
SOS in 1755 , the british captured fort beausjour on the border separating nova scotia from acadia ; soon afterward they ordered the expulsion of the acadians . EOS
SOS william pitt came to power and significantly increased british military resources in the colonies at a time when france was unwilling to risk large convoys to aid the limited forces it had in new france . EOS
SOS william pitt came to power and significantly increased british military resources in the colonies at a time when france was unwilling to risk large convoys to aid the limited forces it had in new france . EOS
SOS france concentrated its forces against prussia and its allies in the european theatre of the war . EOS
SOS though the british were later defeated at UNK UNK in quebec , the french ceded canada in accordance with the 1763 treaty . EOS
SOS france ceded its territory east of the mississippi to great britain . EOS
SOS it ceded french louisiana west of the mississippi river -lrb- including new orleans -rrb- to its ally spain , in compensation for spain 's loss to britain of florida -lrb- spain had ceded this to britain in exchange for the return of havana , cuba -rrb- . EOS
SOS as there had already been a king george 's war in the 1740s , british colonists named the second war in king george 's reign after their opponents , and it became known as the french and indian war . EOS
SOS this traditional name continues as the standard in the united states , but it obscures the fact that indians fought on both sides of the conflict , and that this was part of the seven years ' war , a much larger conflict between france and great britain . EOS
SOS this traditional name continues as the standard in the united states , but it obscures the fact that indians fought on both sides of the conflict , and that this was part of the seven years ' war , a much larger conflict between france and great britain . EOS
SOS other , less frequently used names for the war include the fourth UNK war and the great war for the empire . EOS
SOS " seven years " refers to events in europe , from the official declaration of war in 1756 to the signing of the peace treaty in 1763 . EOS
SOS these dates do not correspond with the fighting on mainland north america , where the fighting between the two colonial powers was largely concluded in six years , from the battle of jumonville glen in 1754 to the capture of montreal in 1760 . EOS
SOS these dates do not correspond with the fighting on mainland north america , where the fighting between the two colonial powers was largely concluded in six years , from the battle of jumonville glen in 1754 to the capture of montreal in 1760 . EOS

SOS the french population numbered about 75,000 and was heavily concentrated along the st. lawrence river valley , with some also in acadia -lrb- present-day new brunswick and parts of nova scotia , including le royale -lrb- present-day cape breton island -rrb- -rrb- . EOS
SOS the french population numbered about 75,000 and was heavily concentrated along the st. lawrence river valley , with some also in acadia -lrb- present-day new brunswick and parts of nova scotia , including le royale -lrb- present-day cape breton island -rrb- -rrb- . EOS
SOS french fur traders and UNK traveled throughout the st. lawrence and mississippi watersheds , did business with local tribes , and often married indian women . EOS
SOS british settlers outnumbered the french 20 to 1 with a population of about 1.5 million ranged along the eastern coast of the continent , from nova scotia and newfoundland in the north , to georgia in the south . EOS
SOS british settlers outnumbered the french 20 to 1 with a population of about 1.5 million ranged along the eastern coast of the continent , from nova scotia and newfoundland in the north , to georgia in the south . EOS
SOS in between the french and the british , large areas were dominated by native tribes . EOS
SOS to the north , the mi ` UNK and the UNK were engaged in father le UNK 's war and still held sway in parts of nova scotia , acadia , and the eastern portions of the province of canada , as well as much of present-day maine . EOS
SOS the iroquois confederation dominated much of present-day upstate new york and the ohio country , although the latter also included algonquian-speaking populations of delaware and shawnee , as well as iroquoian-speaking mingo . EOS
SOS these tribes were formally under iroquois rule , and were limited by them in authority to make agreements . EOS
SOS further south the southeast interior was dominated by UNK catawba , UNK creek and choctaw , and the iroquoian-speaking cherokee tribes . EOS
SOS when war broke out , the french used their trading connections to recruit fighters from tribes in western portions of the great lakes region -lrb- an area not directly subject to the conflict between the french and british -rrb- , including the huron , UNK , UNK , UNK , and UNK . EOS
SOS the british were supported in the war by the iroquois six nations , and also by the cherokee -- until differences sparked the UNK war in 1758 . EOS
SOS at the start of the war , no french regular army troops were stationed in north america , and few british troops . EOS
SOS at the start of the war , no french regular army troops were stationed in north america , and few british troops . EOS
SOS most british colonies mustered local militia companies , generally ill trained and available only for short periods , to deal with native threats , but did not have any standing forces . EOS
SOS the expedition covered about 3,000 miles -lrb- 4,800 km -rrb- between june and november 1749 . EOS
SOS cloron 's expedition force consisted of about 200 troupes de la marine and 30 indians . EOS
SOS when cloron 's expedition arrived at logstown , the native americans in the area informed cloron that they owned the ohio country and that they would trade with the british regardless of the french . EOS
SOS cloron continued south until his expedition reached the confluence of the ohio and the miami rivers , which lay just south of the village of UNK , the home of the miami chief known as " old briton " . EOS
SOS cloron threatened " old briton " with severe consequences if he continued to trade with the british . EOS
SOS " old briton " ignored the warning . EOS
SOS william shirley , the expansionist governor of the province of massachusetts bay , was particularly forceful , stating that british colonists would not be safe as long as the french were present . EOS
SOS in 1749 the british government gave land to the ohio company of virginia for the purpose of developing trade and settlements in the ohio country . EOS
SOS in 1749 the british government gave land to the ohio company of virginia for the purpose of developing trade and settlements in the ohio country . EOS
SOS in 1750 christopher gist , acting on behalf of both virginia and the company , explored the ohio territory and opened negotiations with the indian tribes at logstown . EOS
SOS he completed the 1752 treaty of logstown in which the local indians , through their " UNK " UNK and an iroquois representative , agreed to terms that included permission to build a " strong house " at the mouth of the monongahela river -lrb- the site of present-day pittsburgh , pennsylvania -rrb- . EOS
SOS the war of the austrian succession -lrb- whose north american theater is known as king george 's war -rrb- formally ended in 1748 with the signing of the treaty of aix-la-chapelle . EOS
SOS the war of the austrian succession -lrb- whose north american theater is known as king george 's war -rrb- formally ended in 1748 with the signing of the treaty of aix-la-chapelle . EOS
SOS the issues of conflicting territorial claims between british and french colonies in north america were turned over to a commission to resolve , but it reached no decision . EOS
SOS frontiers from between nova scotia and acadia in the north , to the ohio country in the south , were claimed by both sides . EOS
SOS on march 17 , 1752 , the governor-general of new france , marquis de la UNK , died and was temporarily replaced by charles le UNK de UNK . EOS
SOS on june 21 , the french war party attacked the trading centre at UNK , capturing three traders and killing 14 people of the miami nation , including old briton . EOS
SOS in the spring of 1753 , paul marin de la UNK was given command of a UNK force of troupes de la marine and indians . EOS
SOS he first constructed fort UNK isle -lrb- near present-day erie , pennsylvania -rrb- on lake erie 's south shore . EOS
SOS marin constructed a second fort at fort le UNK -lrb- present-day waterford , pennsylvania -rrb- , designed to guard the headwaters of UNK creek . EOS
SOS his orders were to protect the king 's land in the ohio valley from the british . EOS
SOS tanaghrisson , a chief of the mingo , who were remnants of iroquois and other tribes who had been driven west by colonial expansion . EOS
SOS the british superintendent for indian affairs in the new york region and beyond , johnson was known to the iroquois as warraghiggey , meaning " he who does great things . " EOS
SOS the british superintendent for indian affairs in the new york region and beyond , johnson was known to the iroquois as warraghiggey , meaning " he who does great things . " EOS
SOS in 1746 , johnson was made a colonel of the iroquois . EOS
SOS mohawk chief hendrick , speaker of their tribal council , insisted that the british abide by their obligations and block french expansion . EOS
SOS governor robert dinwiddie of virginia was an investor in the ohio company , which stood to lose money if the french held their claim . EOS
SOS to counter the french military presence in ohio , in october 1753 dinwiddie ordered the 21-year-old major george washington -lrb- whose brother was another ohio company investor -rrb- of the virginia regiment to warn the french to leave virginia territory . EOS
SOS washington left with a small party , picking up along the way jacob van UNK as an interpreter ; christopher gist , a company surveyor working in the area ; and a few mingo led by tanaghrisson . EOS
SOS on december 12 , washington and his men reached fort le UNK . EOS
SOS jacques UNK de saint-pierre , who succeeded marin as commander of the french forces after the latter died on october 29 , invited washington to dine with him . EOS
SOS over dinner , washington presented saint-pierre with the letter from dinwiddie demanding an immediate french withdrawal from the ohio country . EOS
SOS saint-pierre said , " as to the summons you send me to retire , i do not think UNK obliged to obey it . " EOS
SOS he told washington that france 's claim to the region was superior to that of the british , since UNK UNK , UNK de la salle had explored the ohio country nearly a century earlier . EOS
SOS governor duquesne sent additional french forces under UNK UNK de UNK to relieve saint-pierre during the same period , and UNK led 500 men south from fort UNK on april 5 , 1754 . EOS
SOS even before washington returned , dinwiddie had sent a company of 40 men under william trent to that point , where in the early months of 1754 they began construction of a small UNK fort . EOS
SOS he purchased their construction tools to continue building what became fort duquesne . EOS
SOS learning of a french scouting party in the area , washington , with tanaghrisson and his party , surprised the canadians on may 28 in what became known as the battle of jumonville glen . EOS
SOS the historian fred anderson suggests that tanaghrisson was acting to gain the support of the british and regain authority over his own people . EOS
SOS after several months of negotiations , the government of the duke of newcastle decided to send an army expedition the following year to UNK the french . EOS
SOS word of the british military plans leaked to france well before braddock 's departure for north america . EOS
SOS in response , king louis xv dispatched six regiments to new france under the command of baron UNK in 1755 . EOS
SOS the british , intending to blockade french ports , sent out their fleet in february 1755 , but the french fleet had already sailed . EOS
SOS an early important political response to the opening of hostilities was the convening of the albany congress in june and july , 1754 . EOS
SOS the goal of the congress was to formalize a unified front in trade and negotiations with various indians , since allegiance of the various tribes and nations was seen to be pivotal in the success in the war that was unfolding . EOS
SOS the plan that the delegates agreed to was never ratified by the colonial legislatures nor approved of by the crown . EOS
SOS nevertheless , the format of the congress and many specifics of the plan became the prototype for confederation during the war of independence . EOS
SOS braddock -lrb- with george washington as one of his aides -rrb- led about 1,500 army troops and provincial militia on an expedition in june 1755 to take fort duquesne . EOS
SOS the expedition was a disaster . EOS
SOS approximately 1,000 british soldiers were killed or injured . EOS
SOS two future opponents in the american revolutionary war , washington and thomas UNK , played key roles in organizing the retreat . EOS
SOS the french acquired a copy of the british war plans , including the activities of shirley and johnson . EOS
SOS shirley 's efforts to fortify oswego were UNK down in logistical difficulties , exacerbated by shirley 's UNK in managing large expeditions . EOS
SOS in conjunction , shirley was made aware that the french were massing for an attack on fort oswego in his absence when he planned to attack fort niagara . EOS
SOS as a response , shirley left garrisons at oswego , fort bull , and fort williams -lrb- the latter two located on the UNK carry between the mohawk river and wood creek at present-day rome , new york -rrb- . EOS
SOS johnson 's expedition was better organized than shirley 's , which was noticed by new france 's governor , the marquis de vaudreuil . EOS
SOS when johnson was seen as the larger threat , vaudreuil sent UNK to fort st. frdric to meet that threat . EOS
SOS the battle ended inconclusively , with both sides withdrawing from the field . EOS

SOS newcastle replaced him in january 1756 with lord loudoun , with major general james abercrombie as his second in command . EOS
SOS french regular army reinforcements arrived in new france in may 1756 , led by major general UNK de montcalm and seconded by the UNK de UNK and colonel UNK de UNK , all experienced veterans from the war of the austrian succession . EOS
SOS during that time in europe , on may 18 , 1756 , england formally declared war on france , which expanded the war into europe , which was later to be known as the seven years ' war . EOS
SOS scouts had reported the weakness of the british supply chain , so he ordered an attack against the forts shirley had erected at the UNK carry . EOS
SOS in the march battle of fort bull , french forces destroyed the fort and large quantities of supplies , including 45,000 pounds of gunpowder . EOS
SOS they set back any british hopes for campaigns on lake ontario , and endangered the oswego garrison , already short on supplies . EOS
SOS when he arrived in albany , abercrombie refused to take any significant actions until loudoun approved them . EOS

SOS with abercrombie pinned down at albany , montcalm slipped away and led the successful attack on oswego in august . EOS
SOS in the aftermath , montcalm and the indians under his command disagreed about the disposition of prisoners ' personal effects . EOS
SOS loudoun , a capable administrator but a cautious field commander , planned one major operation for 1757 : an attack on new france 's capital , quebec . EOS
SOS leaving a sizable force at fort william henry to distract montcalm , he began organizing for the expedition to quebec . EOS
SOS he was then ordered by william pitt , the secretary of state responsible for the colonies , to attack louisbourg first . EOS
SOS faced with this strength , loudoun returned to new york amid news that a massacre had occurred at fort william henry . EOS
SOS french irregular forces -lrb- canadian scouts and indians -rrb- harassed fort william henry throughout the first half of 1757 . EOS
SOS in february they launched a daring raid against the position across the frozen lake george , destroying UNK and buildings outside the main fortification . EOS
SOS when the withdrawal began , some of montcalm 's indian allies , angered at the lost opportunity for loot , attacked the british column , killing and capturing several hundred men , women , children , and slaves . EOS
SOS the situation in new france was further exacerbated by a poor harvest in 1757 , a difficult winter , and the allegedly corrupt UNK of franois UNK , the intendant of the territory . EOS
SOS montcalm focused his meager resources on the defense of the st. lawrence , with primary defenses at carillon , quebec , and louisbourg , while vaudreuil argued unsuccessfully for a continuation of the raiding tactics that had worked quite effectively in previous years . EOS
SOS the british failures in north america , combined with other failures in the european theater , led to the fall from power of newcastle and his principal military advisor , the duke of cumberland . EOS
SOS pitt 's plan called for three major offensive actions involving large numbers of regular troops , supported by the provincial militias , aimed at capturing the heartlands of new france . EOS
SOS two of the expeditions were successful , with fort duquesne and louisbourg falling to sizable british forces . EOS
SOS the third invasion was stopped with the improbable french victory in the battle of carillon , in which 3,600 UNK famously and decisively defeated abercrombie 's force of 18,000 regulars , militia and native american allies outside the fort the french called carillon and the british called ticonderoga . SOS the british offered france the choice of UNK either its continental north american possessions east of the mississippi or the caribbean islands of guadeloupe and martinique , which had been occupied by the british . EOS
SOS britain gained control of french canada and acadia , colonies containing approximately 80,000 primarily french-speaking roman catholic residents . EOS
SOS the deportation of acadians beginning in 1755 resulted in land made available to migrants from europe and the colonies further south . EOS
SOS the british resettled many acadians throughout its north american provinces , but many went to france , and some went to new orleans , which they had expected to remain french . EOS

SOS philosophers in antiquity used the concept of force in the study of stationary and moving objects and simple machines , but thinkers such as aristotle and archimedes retained fundamental errors in understanding force . EOS
SOS a fundamental error was the belief that a force is required to maintain motion , even at a constant velocity . EOS
SOS with his mathematical insight , sir isaac newton formulated laws of motion that were not UNK for nearly three hundred years . EOS
SOS by the early 20th century , einstein developed a theory of relativity that correctly predicted the action of forces on objects with increasing UNK near the speed of light , and also provided insight into the forces produced by gravitation and inertia . EOS
SOS with modern insights into quantum mechanics and technology that can accelerate particles close to the speed of light , particle physics has devised a standard model to describe forces between particles smaller than atoms . EOS
SOS the standard model predicts that exchanged particles called gauge bosons are the fundamental means by which forces are emitted and absorbed . EOS
SOS only four main interactions are known : in order of decreasing strength , they are : strong , electromagnetic , weak , and gravitational . :2 -- 10:79 high-energy particle physics observations made during the 1970s and 1980s confirmed that the weak and electromagnetic forces are expressions of a more fundamental electroweak interaction . EOS

SOS aristotle provided a philosophical discussion of the concept of a force as an integral part of aristotelian cosmology . EOS
SOS aristotle provided a philosophical discussion of the concept of a force as an integral part of aristotelian cosmology . EOS
SOS in aristotle 's view , the terrestrial sphere contained four elements that come to rest at different " natural places " therein . EOS
SOS aristotle believed that motionless objects on earth , those composed mostly of the elements earth and water , to be in their natural place on the ground and that they will stay that way if left alone . EOS
SOS he distinguished between the innate tendency of objects to find their " natural place " -lrb- e.g . , for heavy bodies to fall -rrb- , which led to " natural motion " , and unnatural or forced motion , which required continued application of a force . EOS
SOS the shortcomings of aristotelian physics would not be fully corrected until the 17th century work of galileo galilei , who was influenced by the late medieval idea that objects in forced motion carried an innate force of impetus . EOS
SOS the shortcomings of aristotelian physics would not be fully corrected until the 17th century work of galileo galilei , who was influenced by the late medieval idea that objects in forced motion carried an innate force of impetus . EOS
SOS the shortcomings of aristotelian physics would not be fully corrected until the 17th century work of galileo galilei , who was influenced by the late medieval idea that objects in forced motion carried an innate force of impetus . EOS
SOS galileo constructed an experiment in which stones and UNK were both rolled down an UNK to disprove the aristotelian theory of motion early in the 17th century . EOS
SOS he showed that the bodies were accelerated by gravity to an extent that was independent of their mass and argued that objects retain their velocity unless acted on by a force , for example friction . EOS
SOS newton 's first law of motion states that objects continue to move in a state of constant velocity unless acted upon by an external net force or resultant force . EOS
SOS this law is an extension of galileo 's insight that constant velocity was associated with a lack of net force -lrb- see a more detailed description of this below -rrb- . EOS
SOS newton proposed that every object with mass has an innate inertia that functions as the fundamental equilibrium " natural state " in place of the aristotelian idea of the " natural state of rest " . EOS
SOS by making rest physically indistinguishable from UNK constant velocity , newton 's first law directly connects inertia with the concept of relative UNK . EOS
SOS in other words , to phrase matters more technically , the laws of physics are the same in every inertial frame of reference , that is , in all frames related by a galilean transformation . EOS
SOS for instance , while traveling in a moving vehicle at a constant velocity , the laws of physics do not change from being at rest . EOS
SOS this is true even though another person who is observing the moving vehicle pass by also observes the ball follow a curving parabolic path in the same direction as the motion of the vehicle . EOS
SOS from the perspective of the person in the car , the vehicle and everything inside of it is at rest : it is the outside world that is moving with a constant speed in the opposite direction . EOS
SOS inertia therefore applies equally well to constant velocity motion as it does to rest . EOS
SOS the concept of inertia can be further generalized to explain the tendency of objects to continue in many different forms of constant motion , even those that are not strictly constant velocity . EOS
SOS the rotational inertia of planet earth is what fixes the UNK of the length of a day and the length of a year . EOS
SOS albert einstein extended the principle of inertia further when he explained that reference frames subject to constant acceleration , such as those UNK toward a UNK object , were physically equivalent to inertial reference frames . EOS
SOS this is why , for example , astronauts experience UNK when in free-fall orbit around the earth , and why newton 's laws of motion are more easily UNK in such environments . EOS
SOS this principle of equivalence was one of the foundational underpinnings for the development of the general theory of relativity . EOS
SOS newton 's second law asserts the direct proportionality of acceleration to force and the inverse proportionality of acceleration to mass . EOS
SOS UNK can be defined through UNK measurements . EOS
SOS general relativity offers an equivalence between space-time and mass , but lacking a coherent theory of quantum gravity , it is unclear as to how or whether this connection is relevant on microscales . EOS
SOS general relativity offers an equivalence between space-time and mass , but lacking a coherent theory of quantum gravity , it is unclear as to how or whether this connection is relevant on microscales . EOS
SOS with some justification , newton 's second law can be taken as a quantitative definition of mass by writing the law as an equality ; the relative units of force and mass then are fixed . EOS
SOS newton 's third law is a result of applying symmetry to situations where forces can be attributed to the presence of different objects . EOS
SOS newton 's third law is a result of applying symmetry to situations where forces can be attributed to the presence of different objects . EOS
SOS the third law means that all forces are interactions between different bodies , -lsb- note 3 -rsb- and thus that there is no such thing as a unidirectional force or a force that acts on only one body . EOS
SOS alternatively , if an external force acts on the system , then the center of mass will experience an acceleration proportional to the magnitude of the external force divided by the mass of the system . :19 -1 EOS
SOS this means that in a closed system of particles , there are no internal forces that are unbalanced . EOS
SOS alternatively , if an external force acts on the system , then the center of mass will experience an acceleration proportional to the magnitude of the external force divided by the mass of the system . :19 -1 EOS
SOS since forces are perceived as pushes or pulls , this can provide an intuitive understanding for describing forces . EOS
SOS as with other physical concepts -lrb- e.g . temperature -rrb- , the intuitive understanding of forces is quantified using precise operational definitions that are consistent with direct observations and compared to a standard measurement scale . EOS
SOS through experimentation , it is determined that laboratory measurements of forces are fully consistent with the conceptual definition of force offered by newtonian mechanics . EOS
SOS through experimentation , it is determined that laboratory measurements of forces are fully consistent with the conceptual definition of force offered by newtonian mechanics . EOS
SOS because of these characteristics , forces are classified as " vector quantities " . EOS
SOS this means that forces follow a different set of mathematical rules than physical quantities that do not have direction -lrb- denoted scalar quantities -rrb- . EOS
SOS associating forces with vectors avoids such problems . EOS
SOS if both of these pieces of information are not known for each force , the situation is ambiguous . EOS
SOS historically , forces were first quantitatively investigated in conditions of static equilibrium where several forces canceled each other out . EOS
SOS such experiments demonstrate the crucial properties that forces are additive vector quantities : they have magnitude and direction . EOS
SOS when two forces act on a point particle , the resulting force , the resultant -lrb- also called the net force -rrb- , can be determined by following the parallelogram rule of vector addition : the addition of two vectors represented by sides of a parallelogram , gives an equivalent resultant vector that is equal in magnitude and direction to the UNK of the parallelogram . EOS
SOS however , if the forces are acting on an extended body , their respective lines of application must also be specified in order to account for their effects on the motion of the body . EOS
SOS when two forces act on a point particle , the resulting force , the resultant -lrb- also called the net force -rrb- , can be determined by following the parallelogram rule of vector addition : the addition of two vectors represented by sides of a parallelogram , gives an equivalent resultant vector that is equal in magnitude and direction to the UNK of the parallelogram . EOS
SOS as well as being added , forces can also be resolved into independent components at right angles to each other . EOS
SOS a horizontal force pointing northeast can therefore be split into two forces , one pointing north , and one pointing east . EOS
SOS UNK these component forces using vector addition yields the original force . EOS
SOS this is because , for orthogonal components , the components of the vector sum are uniquely determined by the scalar addition of the components of the individual vectors . EOS
SOS orthogonal force vectors can be three-dimensional with the third component being at UNK to the other two . EOS
SOS pushing against an object on a UNK surface can result in a situation where the object does not move because the applied force is opposed by static friction , generated between the object and the table surface . EOS
SOS pushing against an object on a UNK surface can result in a situation where the object does not move because the applied force is opposed by static friction , generated between the object and the table surface . EOS
SOS for a situation with no movement , the static friction force exactly balances the applied force resulting in no acceleration . EOS
SOS the static friction increases or decreases in response to the applied force up to an upper limit determined by the characteristics of the contact between the surface and the object . EOS
SOS a static equilibrium between two forces is the most usual way of measuring forces , using simple devices such as weighing scales and spring balances . EOS
SOS for example , an object suspended on a vertical spring scale experiences the force of gravity acting on the object balanced by a force applied by the " spring reaction force " , which equals the object 's weight . EOS
SOS for example , an object suspended on a vertical spring scale experiences the force of gravity acting on the object balanced by a force applied by the " spring reaction force " , which equals the object 's weight . EOS
SOS using such tools , some quantitative force laws were discovered : that the force of gravity is proportional to volume for objects of constant density -lrb- widely exploited for millennia to define standard weights -rrb- ; archimedes ' principle for buoyancy ; archimedes ' analysis of the lever ; boyle 's law for gas pressure ; and hooke 's law for springs . EOS
SOS these were all formulated and experimentally verified before isaac newton expounded his three laws of motion . EOS
SOS dynamic equilibrium was first described by galileo who noticed that certain assumptions of aristotelian physics were contradicted by observations and logic . EOS
SOS galileo concluded that motion in a constant velocity was completely equivalent to rest . EOS
SOS galileo concluded that motion in a constant velocity was completely equivalent to rest . EOS
SOS thus , in an aristotelian universe , the falling cannonball would land behind the foot of the mast of a moving ship . EOS
SOS however , when this experiment is actually conducted , the cannonball always falls at the foot of the mast , as if the cannonball knows to travel with the ship despite being separated from it . EOS
SOS a simple case of dynamic equilibrium occurs in constant velocity motion across a surface with kinetic friction . EOS
SOS in such a situation , a force is applied in the direction of motion while the kinetic friction force exactly opposes the applied force . EOS
SOS however , when kinetic friction is taken into consideration it is clear that there is no net force causing constant velocity motion . EOS
SOS aristotle UNK this motion as being caused by the applied force . EOS
SOS the notion " force " keeps its meaning in quantum mechanics , though one is now dealing with operators instead of classical variables and though the physics is now described by the schrdinger equation instead of newtonian equations . EOS
SOS the notion " force " keeps its meaning in quantum mechanics , though one is now dealing with operators instead of classical variables and though the physics is now described by the schrdinger equation instead of newtonian equations . EOS
SOS however , the potentials v -lrb- x , y , z -rrb- or fields , from which the forces generally can be derived , are treated similar to classical position variables , i.e . , . EOS
SOS the notion " force " keeps its meaning in quantum mechanics , though one is now dealing with operators instead of classical variables and though the physics is now described by the schrdinger equation instead of newtonian equations . EOS
SOS however , already in quantum mechanics there is one " caveat " , namely the particles acting onto each other do not only possess the spatial variable , but also a discrete intrinsic angular UNK variable called the " spin " , and there is the pauli principle relating the space and the spin variables . EOS
SOS however , already in quantum mechanics there is one " caveat " , namely the particles acting onto each other do not only possess the spatial variable , but also a discrete intrinsic angular UNK variable called the " spin " , and there is the pauli principle relating the space and the spin variables . EOS
SOS depending on the value of the spin , identical particles split into two different classes , fermions and bosons . EOS
SOS if two identical fermions -lrb- e.g . electrons -rrb- have a symmetric spin function -lrb- e.g . parallel spins -rrb- the spatial variables must be antisymmetric -lrb- i.e . they exclude each other from their places much as if there was a repulsive force -rrb- , and vice versa , i.e . for antiparallel spins the position variables must be symmetric -lrb- i.e . the apparent force must be attractive -rrb- . EOS
SOS if two identical fermions -lrb- e.g . electrons -rrb- have a symmetric spin function -lrb- e.g . parallel spins -rrb- the spatial variables must be antisymmetric -lrb- i.e . they exclude each other from their places much as if there was a repulsive force -rrb- , and vice versa , i.e . for antiparallel spins the position variables must be symmetric -lrb- i.e . the apparent force must be attractive -rrb- . EOS
SOS in modern particle physics , forces and the acceleration of particles are explained as a mathematical by-product of exchange of UNK gauge bosons . EOS
SOS with the development of quantum field theory and general relativity , it was realized that force is a redundant concept arising from conservation of momentum -lrb- UNK in relativity and momentum of virtual particles in quantum electrodynamics -rrb- . EOS
SOS the conservation of momentum can be directly derived from the UNK or symmetry of space and so is usually considered more fundamental than the concept of a force . EOS
SOS while sophisticated mathematical descriptions are needed to predict , in full detail , the accurate result of such interactions , there is a conceptually simple way to describe such interactions through the use of feynman diagrams . EOS
SOS in a feynman diagram , each matter particle is represented as a straight line -lrb- see world line -rrb- traveling through time , which normally increases up or to the right in the diagram . EOS
SOS all of the forces in the universe are based on four fundamental interactions . EOS
SOS the strong and weak forces are nuclear forces that act only at very short distances , and are responsible for the interactions between subatomic particles , including nucleons and compound nuclei . EOS
SOS the electromagnetic force acts between electric charges , and the gravitational force acts between masses . EOS
SOS the electromagnetic force acts between electric charges , and the gravitational force acts between masses . EOS
SOS for example , friction is a manifestation of the electromagnetic force acting between the atoms of two surfaces , and the pauli exclusion principle , which does not permit atoms to pass through each other . EOS
SOS for example , isaac newton unified the force responsible for objects falling at the surface of the earth with the force responsible for the orbits of celestial mechanics in his universal theory of gravitation . EOS
SOS in the 20th century , the development of quantum mechanics led to a modern understanding that the first three fundamental forces -lrb- all except gravity -rrb- are manifestations of matter -lrb- fermions -rrb- interacting by exchanging virtual particles called gauge bosons . EOS
SOS physicists are still attempting to develop self-consistent unification models that would combine all four fundamental interactions into a theory of everything . EOS
SOS what we now call gravity was not identified as a universal force until the work of isaac newton . EOS
SOS galileo was instrumental in describing the characteristics of falling objects by determining that the acceleration of every object in free-fall was constant and independent of the mass of the object . EOS
SOS today , this acceleration due to gravity towards the surface of the earth is usually designated as and has a magnitude of about UNK meters per second squared -lrb- this measurement is taken from sea level and may vary depending on location -rrb- , and points toward the center of the earth . EOS
SOS today , this acceleration due to gravity towards the surface of the earth is usually designated as and has a magnitude of about UNK meters per second squared -lrb- this measurement is taken from sea level and may vary depending on location -rrb- , and points toward the center of the earth . EOS
SOS this observation means that the force of gravity on an object at the earth 's surface is directly proportional to the object 's mass . EOS
SOS newton came to realize that the effects of gravity might be observed in different ways at larger distances . EOS
SOS in particular , newton determined that the acceleration of the moon around the earth could be ascribed to the same force of gravity if the acceleration due to gravity decreased as an inverse square law . EOS
SOS further , newton realized that the acceleration due to gravity is proportional to the mass of the attracting body . EOS
SOS combining these ideas gives a formula that relates the mass -lrb- -rrb- and the radius -lrb- -rrb- of the earth to the gravitational acceleration : EOS
SOS not until 1798 was henry cavendish able to make the first measurement of using a UNK balance ; this was widely reported in the press as a measurement of the mass of the earth since knowing could allow one to solve for the earth 's mass given the above equation . EOS

SOS newton , however , realized that since all celestial bodies followed the same laws of motion , his law of gravity had to be universal . EOS
SOS it was only the orbit of the planet mercury that newton 's law of gravitation seemed not to fully explain . EOS
SOS some UNK predicted the existence of another planet -lrb- UNK -rrb- that would explain the discrepancies ; however , despite some early indications , no such planet could be found . EOS
SOS when albert einstein formulated his theory of general relativity -lrb- gr -rrb- he turned his attention to the problem of mercury 's orbit and found that his theory added a correction , which could account for the discrepancy . EOS

SOS since then , and so far , general relativity has been acknowledged as the theory that best explains gravity . EOS
SOS thus , the straight line path in space-time is seen as a curved line in space , and it is called the ballistic trajectory of the object . EOS
SOS the time derivative of the changing momentum of the object is what we label as " gravitational force " . EOS
SOS it is only when observing the motion in a global sense that the curvature of space-time can be observed and the force is inferred from the object 's curved path . EOS
SOS through combining the definition of electric current as the time rate of change of electric charge , a rule of vector multiplication called lorentz 's law describes the force on a charge moving in a magnetic field . EOS
SOS the connection between electricity and magnetism allows for the description of a unified electromagnetic force that acts on a charge . EOS
SOS through combining the definition of electric current as the time rate of change of electric charge , a rule of vector multiplication called lorentz 's law describes the force on a charge moving in a magnetic field . EOS
SOS this force can be written as a sum of the electrostatic force -lrb- due to the electric field -rrb- and the magnetic force -lrb- due to the magnetic field -rrb- . EOS
SOS the origin of electric and magnetic fields would not be fully explained until 1864 when james clerk maxwell unified a number of earlier theories into a set of 20 scalar equations , which were later reformulated into 4 vector equations by oliver heaviside and josiah willard gibbs . EOS

SOS tension forces can be modeled using ideal strings that are massless , UNK , UNK , and UNK . EOS
SOS they can be combined with ideal UNK , which allow ideal strings to switch physical direction . EOS
SOS ideal strings transmit tension forces UNK in UNK pairs so that if two objects are connected by an ideal string , any force directed along the string by the first object is accompanied by a force directed along the string in the opposite direction by the second object . EOS
SOS these tandem effects result ultimately in the conservation of mechanical energy since the work done on the load is the same no matter how complicated the machine . EOS

SOS torque is the rotation equivalent of force in the same way that angle is the rotational equivalent for position , angular velocity for velocity , and angular momentum for momentum . EOS
SOS as a consequence of newton 's first law of motion , there exists rotational inertia that ensures that all bodies maintain their angular momentum unless acted upon by an unbalanced torque . EOS
SOS likewise , newton 's second law of motion can be used to derive an analogous equation for the instantaneous angular acceleration of the rigid body : EOS
SOS this means that the unbalanced centripetal force felt by any object is always directed toward the center of the curving path . EOS
SOS such forces act perpendicular to the velocity vector associated with the motion of an object , and therefore do not change the speed of the object -lrb- magnitude of the velocity -rrb- , but only the direction of the velocity vector . EOS

SOS a conservative force that acts on a closed system has an associated mechanical work that allows energy to convert only between kinetic or potential forms . EOS
SOS a conservative force that acts on a closed system has an associated mechanical work that allows energy to convert only between kinetic or potential forms . EOS
SOS this means that for a closed system , the net mechanical energy is conserved whenever a conservative force acts on the system . EOS
SOS the force , therefore , is related directly to the difference in potential energy between two different locations in space , and can be considered to be an artifact of the potential field in the same way that the direction and amount of a flow of water can be considered to be an artifact of the contour map of the elevation of an area .
